Of course, I oversleep again, and Brittany has a piece of toast clamped in her mouth as she shrugs her coat on. Seeing my eyes open, she places the food before me and inclines her head toward the open mouth of her rucksack on the desk.

“Get in.”

I've already begun tearing at the rock-like bread before I look up to see the cavernous interior of the bag. “Joking, of course.”

“No. After your little stunt on the way home, you're riding with me out of sight.”

Should I argue the case, I wonder?
1113311212122111111222222211.title: Back to the Dark Place

11133112121221111112222222111.content:
“Please. It's bad enough that I'm an inch tall – I don't want to be locked away in darkness as well! It's all right for you, walking along just like normal, but I'll be trapped in a hellish place with no sense of time or distance! Please.”

Brittany rolls her eyes. “Fine. You can ride my shoulder again. If you have to talk to me, at least make a ringing phone noise first, so we can cover things up.”

“Cool,” I brush the last of my crumbs of crumbs from my hands and watch as the magnificent giant stoops, her tremendous height almost telescoping, yet her immense face still filling my vision as the shoulder comes level with the top of the desk. I hop across easily, thinking to myself that I still haven't revealed my super-jumping capabilities to the girl; it may help to hold that in reserve for the moment.

Brittany rises, slinging her bag over the other shoulder with a sickeningly loud thud. How much must that weigh, to me? Yet she carries it casually...

It's a rolling journey as she walks downstairs, perhaps making it purposefully uncomfortable as a lesson for talking back to her? Whatever. She's just a means to an end, this girl. I smile up at the side of her head, turning face forward again once things level out and she approaches the front door.

Her mother is there to see her off, a false smile on her face, as if there were no bad blood between them. How dare she! She deserves another piece of my mind, I reckon...
11133112121221111112222222111.title: Parting Barb

111331121212211111122222221111.content:
"When we get home, I expect an apology for Brittany!" I say as the girl passes her mother. Of course, at shoulder height I'm immediately in the woman's line of sight, and her eyebrows rise as she identifies my shrunken form.

After my tirade I spend a moment watching that face, the elegant lines that differentiate it from Brittany's youthful features. It's almost slow motion as her hand sweeps out, hard knuckles smashing into me, knocking me to the ground at her feet.

Stunned doesn't begin to describe my situation, brief though the sensation is. I may be injured terribly, judging by the pain! Then Brittany's mother brings the heel of her shoe down on me, piercing me through and pouring my insides all across the floor.
111331121212211111122222221111.title: Learn Restraint

111331121212211111122222221112.content:
The girl fairly dashes out of the house, maybe a mumbled farewell to her parents – is she running out quickly so they don't see me, or so I don't see them? - and then into the street, retreading the route from yesterday afternoon. I bask in the sun that greets this fresh morning, admiring the giant world from my ambulatory vantage point.

Several times I attempt conversation, but Brittany only ever returns simple answers, never allowing for a back and forth, turning it into more of an interview. And even then, she's not very forthcoming. For a girl over sixty times my size, she manages to hide a lot.

Back at the school, other titanic teenagers are arriving, the majority dropped off by the busload. Brittany is in the minority of walkers, and even more isolated by the fact that she alone is,well, alone. Others have arrived together with friends, chatting and laughing together. If I was hoping to get some insight into the female condition, perhaps I backed the wrong horse.

That came out wrong. I turn to apologise to Brittany, but realise just in time that I didn't say that out loud. My thoughts just hammer so loudly these days, leaving me no peace...

I look away again, and see the latest contingent of girls arrive by automobile. They're pretty much interchangeable at this point, but past them I can see their parents, having driven them in. And that one – wow, she must be a step-mother or sister or something, because she's absolutely gorgeous, no way old enough to have birthed a girl that age...

She steps out of the car to properly say goodbye, extending to her full height on legs that stretch forever, perfectly formed and supporting an able torso with... well, a prodigious upper reach. I'm aware that I'm objectifying again, but she's clearly a considerate woman as well as a sexy one, and I feel that I should shout out, say something, let her know that her love is appreciated -
111331121212211111122222221112.title: Journey to School

1113311212122111111222222211121.content:
“Look at that – so caring! To personally drive that girl to the gates of the school! There should be more people like you!”

I can feel my second inch of height coming on, and stumble awkwardly. The woman clearly heard me, but glances in my direction only for a moment before turning back to her car.

Her 'daughter', though – she pays closer attention. As she strides closer, the older woman's miniature (yet still towering to me) duplicate frowns. Thinking back over what I'd said, there's every chance it may have come across as sarcastic and rude.

Oops.

“Hey there, Brittany,” she says, sweeping aside long, blonde hair with one delicately manicured hand. “You seem to have something on your shoulder...”

Then that delicate hand lashes out again, too fast for me to register, long fingers brushing against me with the force of a speeding car. I'm smacked from my perch, tumbling to the hard ground below. Brittany is too slow to catch me this time, as I tumble past the entire length of her body and legs.

It's a miracle that I'm only dazed, and perhaps I have the witch's magic to thank for that as much as my reduced mass. I fall slightly clear of Brittany – her converse sneakers are some way off to the right – but this other girl is right ahead, walking closer, denim towers powering the tread of her sabrinas. It's a deliberate pace, slow for someone of her size, and above it all I can hear her voice:

“I'll just get that for you...”

Maybe now's the time for me to abandon this whole school experiment and bug out. I got a few boosts here, and my jumping ace-in-the-hole can get me clear of this trouble very easily!
1113311212122111111222222211121.title: Growth at the Gates

11133112121221111112222222111212.content:
The giant girl stomps toward me, but then another pair of feet, one after the other, come crashing down around me, one to each side, flattening the forest of grass with no trouble. I'm bigger than I was when Brittany laid me at her feet yesterday, yet still those mommas are scary.

They're sitting in sandals, and with each individual toe visible, that's far more intimidating than a shoe, somehow. Rather than two monsters, there are ten; at two inches tall, I'm smaller than each of them! The legs are bare and vanish up into a scandalously short denim skirt, but I don't want to look upwards when I'm in mortal fear of things on my level!

“Hey, Anna,” a voice from on high says, clearly the owner of these new feet, “You should go and pick on someone your own size.”

Well said! And with that, perhaps I should take my cue and vamoose!
11133112121221111112222222111212.title: Defensive Toes

choices: Wait for Brittany to help out
111331121212211111122222221112122.content:
Anna stops where she is, presumably thinking the situation over. “Fine,” her voice thunders from somewhere above, “you and your girlfriend have fun with that thing. I'll see you later in class!”

Those feet turn smartly on the spot and march away, and I breathe a sigh of relief. I look back to Brittany's own colossal clodhoppers, but I can't make out much past the thumb sweeping toward me.

There's no time for much as it and its partner in crime (I suspect a finger) snare me between them, forcing the breath from my body as they squeeze my chest. Then I'm wrenched into the air, praying that this girl knows not to squeeze too tight as the rest of a hand joins in forming a fist around me. My head peeks from the top, and given my two-inch height I'm pleased to feel my feet settle atop the pinky finger as it closes off beneath them.

The world goes past in a blur, but I can see the bare legs of the girl that scared Anna away, then I pass beyond her shorts to the light blouse and up to her face.

As I get bigger, I can get a better handle on faces. I don't have to pan my eyes around quite so much to get the whole view, and expressions come into focus that much easier. The red-haired girl, Brittany's age easily, smiles in wonder as she looks at me, buffeting me this way and that as she inspects my miniscule form. How much longer should I wait before saying something?
111331121212211111122222221112122.title: Picked Up.  Challenged

1113311212122111111222222211121221.content:
“Truly, you're as gracious as you are beautiful, to save a worthless guy like myself,” I announce with what little breath I have. But, as I suspected, that massive face does not shrink before me, not even one tiny zit. She's a teenager too.

“Wow Brittany,” she says, her eyes moving from me to something distant, over my head, “he talks! You weren't kidding, were you? I must admit that I thought he'd be smaller...”

“Well, he does grow every time he hands one of those cheesy compliments to a woman," comes the unmistakable voice of the other girl. "Just hand him over, Scarlett.” And I cringe at the name: Brittany? Scarlett? What have naming conventions come to?

Then I am whisked away by the finger and thumb, which release me to land on a familiar and almost comforting location: Brittany's palm. It's smaller than I remember, and as I struggle to my feet I note with appreciation that I'm as tall as a thumb now. Tom Thumb, really. Smiling, I look up at her face.

Brittany's not smiling. “What did I tell you about riding on my shoulder? I guess this is your way of telling me you want to spend the rest of the day in my bag.”

“No, no, I'll be good -” I start, but by then the hand is tipping, and as much as I scrabble at the soft surface of the skin I cannot arrest my fall downward, down into the unknown darkness of her bag. I hit something hard and pause to consider its ominous shape before the sound of a zip takes the light away, leaving me in pitch darkness.
1113311212122111111222222211121221.title: Enter Scarlett

choices: Agree to do a favour for Scarlett
Refuse to be a tool for these girls
11133112121221111112222222111212211.content:
"Hey!" you shout with your normal-size voice. "You can't do this to me! We need to talk, now, or I'm going to scream this place down!"

The zip opens, and an exasperated Brittany looks down at you. "Okay. We can talk. Just be quiet, okay?"

Scarlett's face butts in alongside the other girl's, and she giggles as she talks. "Are you really taking orders from this little guy? Why is he hanging around with us, anyway? If we're too young to give him his mojo, what's the point?"

"Well," you admit, coughing in embarrassment. "I have to talk to women, compliment them on their non-sexual appeals, and I thought that, with some females like you girls, I could learn what a woman wants..."

"Really?" Scarlett laughs again. "Okay, Mel Gibson, but what's in it for us? Why should we help you?"

"Common human kindness?"

"Hah! Listen bucko, we can help you out, but you can do something for us first, yeah? Something that only a small dude like you can do."

Brittany frowns, but Scarlett raises a hand. "Bear with me. You want to know how women think in general, I want to know what a few specific boys are thinking. This is a girls-only school, but there's a boys-only one next door. And I want to know if I've caught the eye of a certain someone over there..."
11133112121221111112222222111212211.title: An Offered Deal

choices: Pay a compliment to the goddess
111331121212211111122222221112122111.content:
"Yeah sure, whatever," I mutter, wondering about my brief venture into second person narrative. "What do I have to do?"

Scarlett's fingers answer before her voice does, their bulky forms prying my two-inch tall self from the bag. While delicate, I accrue a few bruises before ending up in her palm, looking up at a smile I can only describe as smarmy.

"Soooo.." she begins, taking a breath. "His name's Jim Harrison and he has the sweetest eyes! He's captain of their soccer team, and we can see them practicing on days when -"

"Enough, enough. How am I meant to find this kid? It'll take me days to search a school, even if I don;t get stepped on!"

"Well," Scarlett offers, looking away, "I may know his schedule off-by-heart, and know that he's due for French next. That's in room twelve on the ground floor, bee-tee-double-yoo."

I sigh. "So I get inside this school, track down this Jimmy -"

"Jim."

"Jim, and then wh-"

I gasp as Scarlett hurriedly tips her hand, dropping me into Brittany's waiting embrace. I share a look with my original rescuer, and smile as she mimes a crazy face. "You're not quite so enamoured of Jim Harrison then?"

"Ignore her," Scarlett says. "She thinks I can't see her looking at Will Terrence, and he's gross. Now, hold still!"

Those last words shock me, but not as much ad Scarlett's fingers squeezing my sides again, but this time one of them prying at my trousers. "Hey!" I shout, struggling to look behind me. Then a hard,cold feeling down my back as something is tucked into my pants. "My phone number," she explains, patting me on the head. "Just make sure that Jim gets it, 'kay?"

Once it's in place, Scarlett lifts me from Brittany's hand and wastes no time in beginning to walk. With my own feet dangling in mid-air, I can't help but look downward, watching the girl's immense, sandal-clad feet stomping across the tarmac. In seconds, she's striding onto dirt, stopping before the metal fence that separates the girls from the boys.

Then her left foot goes into overdrive, pawing-at and gouging the earth, heaping a mound of soil. Then Scarlett descends, knees bending to bring the ground up close. Her pinch releases, allowing air into me again as I touch down on my own two feet. Here, closer to, the mound that those monstrous feet kicked up is huge, and the hole is big enough for someone of my scale to scramble underneath the fence.

I turn to see Scarlett standing up to her full height, waving a hand forward to urge me on. Brittany stomps up to join her, and the two girls explain themselves to me in one line.

"Remember: room twelve!"

"We'll stop by here when we can through the day, to wait for you."

Well, they have to get inside now that the bell has gone, and I can't waste any time myself. I spare a wave before venturing into the under-tunnel, scuffing through the dirt and scratching at the massive slip of paper at my back. Once into the sun again, I can see the departing form of black-uniformed giants, the boys heading inside with a haste just as lacking as that of the girls.

Still, I need to run after them if I'm going to get into that school building before the door closes in my face! Throwing a few leaps in with the spurts of sprinting, I keep myself at their heels, and duck inside moments before the monolithic portal crushes closed in my wake.

I pause to catch my breath as the giants crush on their way. What a miracle that none of them spotted me! Once their forms have receded somewhat down the corridor, I can walk on, looking around to see any landmarks. And indeed, room numbers are visible high up on the receded wooden surfaces sprinkled amongst the sheer walls. Number twelve will be a way on in...

It's a trek through the hallways, an asexual environment as much as the girls school was. Okay, maybe the future potential of the female form had me a teensy bit distracted, but it's odd that my day of trying to pick up chicks has left me sheltered away from any women!

Almost laughing, I turn a corner to find myself proved wrong. She's wearing a trouser suit, so her body is concealed from my sight, but with just her face revealed, killer cheekbones and an easy smile surrounded by blonde hair, my giggle turns into an awed sigh.

In an all-boys school, a woman of this quality must be treated as a goddess. To me, she is one in physicality as well as beauty, and I nearly fall to my knees. Is she a teacher here? No reason I shouldn't stop off to talk with her and get a little height in this desert.

Do I really owe Scarlett and Brittany anything?
111331121212211111122222221112122111.title: On A Mission

choices: Tell her about the girls, and the contact number you have on you
Ask for her help, get into her good graces
1113311212122111111222222211121221111.content:
How to compliment her? I wonder as I walk closer. Well, she's clearly dedicated to her role to be here alone... A desire to teach? Ah, I'll wing it.

"Hello, madam," doesn't hurt to be polite, "you're doing a fine job of keeping these halls clear of slackers!"

Eyes snap down to fix on me, and widen as they witness my height increase by half again, making me three inches tall. I actually laugh now, and therefore have no time to move before the goddess steps up to me and stoops, snatching me up in her fist.

She stands up again, my body encompassed entirely within her grip, head and shoulders just free, arms loosely lying across the top of her titanic thumb.

Closer, her face is older than I'd imagined, but even with the wrinkles around her eyes and that enchanting smile, she's beautiful. "Ans just what are you, little fellow?" she asks me.
1113311212122111111222222211121221111.title: Blonde Goddess

choices: She stores you in the teachers' lounge for now
She stuffs you into her back pocket for now
She hands you off to the school caretaker for safekeeping
11133112121221111112222222111212211112.content:
"I'm a little shrunken man looking for help in a big, bad world," I explain. "And you seem like a nice type. Fancy helping a fellow out?"

The teacher considers the three-inch man in her grip. "And what are you doing in this boys' school, mister little shrunken man?"

"Long story. All that matters now is getting back to normal size. It's a simple process that I'm sure you'll be happy to help me with!"

"Perhaps," she whispers, bringing me close to her lips. "But not right now. Wait til the end of the school day, and we can talk properly."
11133112121221111112222222111212211112.title: Those Who Can, Do

11133112121221111112222222111212212.content:
It's totally dark, and as Brittany moves the clustered objects about and above me shudder and rub, an eerie cacophony that promises swift death should anything overbalance and fall onto me. I'm jostled myself, and can barely order my thoughts at the commotion.

I really don't want to be carried in a bag.

It all goes on for far too long, until one final, shuddering impact marks the bag being put down, and moments later the sky parts to reveal a face and questing hand. Perhaps now I can seek Brittany's forgiveness?
11133112121221111112222222111212212.title: This Bag is Totes Exciting

111331121212211111122222221112122121.content:
“Psst,” I manage, “can I come out now?”

“No,” she whispers back, “I'm in the middle of a class! Just stay there, and I'll bring you out during lunch!”

That's hours away! How am I going to keep myself sane, stuck in a teenager's bag?

A gigantic book and pencil case are hefted past me, like a crane at a construction site, and I decide against speaking up again. I'm two inches tall, which isn't bad for less than a day's work. I just need to devote my time to perfecting my patter!

Wait – I stuck along with this girl mainly so I could learn about the female sex, and I can't do that from down here! I watch the hand retreat with its findings, up into the light, and see that the zip has been left open. The sounds of conversation mull down from above.

I could climb up the uneven surface of the bag's interior, and listen out for anything good. That wouldn't be 'leaving the bag', so I really wouldn't be disobeying Brittany in any way. It would be a hell of a lot better than sitting doing nothing!
111331121212211111122222221112122121.title: The Thrill Ride Continues

1113311212122111111222222211121221211.content:
The texture of the bag is rough and easily scalable, and that light is attainable in no time. I blink a little as I drink in the full majesty of the classroom's illumination, swinging my head from side to side to note the height of Brittany's leg to my left, stretching upward to the underside of the desk.

The droning voice of the teacher seems to be describing some fascinating weather feature – this is a geography class? It doesn't appear to be that thrilling for the students though, as I can hear Scarlett's whispered tones above, asking Brittany about that little dude she has in her bag...

Interesting! This is just the sort of thing I need to listen out for! But there's a hint of Anna's voice somewhere, also whispering, but louder, more insistent...
1113311212122111111222222211121221211.title: Classroom Gossip

11133112121221111112222222111212212112.content:
It seems an incredible distance across the aisle, between desks. So far to where Anna and her friend sit, their feet angled in my direction. From their words – what I can hear over the discussion of Brittany and Scarlett – they're interested in me, and have spotted my head peeking out from the bag.

Louder is the voice of the teacher, a mature, enchanting tone belabouring some educational point that I don't care for. But that is the voice of a woman! Not some teenage girl, content to lock an incredibly interesting two-inch man in her bag! No, that is someone that will appreciate me!

Trouble is, I'll have to move past Anna and her friend to approach the front of the class. A risk worth taking, I'm sure, but it would be far safer to stay where I am, and perhaps inspect these two who are acting as my guardians.
11133112121221111112222222111212212112.title: Crawling Through Class

choices: Find some girl to eavesdrop on
111331121212211111122222221112122121122.content:
I stroll by the stable monuments that are Brittany's feet, stopping just shy of Scarlett's be-sandalled toes (and pause to think - Brittany and Scarlett? What are names coming to these days? I feel old just thinking that...). The bulk shields me somewhat from the chatter of their classmates and teacher, and I can hear slightly better, funneled from directly above, their own conversation.

The gist appears to be Scarlett trying to convince Brittany of all the awesome things they can do with me - to me - now that they have me. Not thinking of me as a person, but as a thing, an object to be used!

Brittany refuses her, laughing off the wilder ideas and telling her friend that she was going to help me. Yeah, that's showing her! I walk over to those giant toes, wagging a finger dramatically. Why, if I were my real size, she'd never think of doing such things to me! Who is she to talk that way about me?

Then Scarlett moves her foot casually, smashing into me with horrific force to send me tumbling head over heels. The sandal crashes to the ground no more than an inch from its original position, but still a cloud of dust erupts from its impact.

Fine. Be that way.

So, it turns out that girls that have a two-inch tall man around will tend to talk about him. If I'm to surreptitiously learn about Female Ways, I'll need a control group. I could wander to some other girl during this class and listen in there. I'm sure there'll be plenty of time to return to Brittany's bag before she leaves..!
111331121212211111122222221112122121122.title: Putting the Foot Down

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
No. Too dangerous. Scarlett almost crushed me accidently, what hope do I have loose in this room full of giants? With a heavy heart (for a two-inch tall dude, at any rate) I edge around the feet and back to the wall of Brittany's bag, and put my all into climbing it. It's exhausting, as I was never the healthiest of individuals to begin with, and even with adequate and plentiful handholds this is a near-sheer face I'm climbing here. I would jump, but sudden movement may attract unwanted attention.

As I crest the lip of the bag, careful around the deadly edges of the zipper, I realise how tired I am. My poor little body can't take too much of a workout, it seems. Just a little nap, I think to myself, that's all...

It's jostling that wakes me, and motion, as of the bag around me being jolted in an unnatural manner. Not just being carried by a walking giant - if anything, that's a soothing sensation - but of it tumbling, falling out of place, impacting the floor -

My arms are over my head, shielding me from the cascade of objects shaken loose, but I'm safe. I can't say the same for the carrier of the bag, not with any certainty. I should get out of here, check that Brittany's safe -

Shouldn't I?
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Turbulence

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"Let me help you with that," a voice says, as insincere as any chat-up line I ever spouted. As I emerge into the light, I can see the speaker clearly, a stooping girl whose smiling visage is looking around as one of her hands reaches toward the bag. To one side, Brittany is clambering to her feet, still a little woozy, not really paying attention - a perfect chance for this stranger to snatch me!

"Keep your stinking hands to yourself!" I shout up at the smirking teenager, and she seems quite taken aback, stumbling slightly into another towering form, one that I recognise as Anna. "Are you all right, Brittany?"

My friend smiles as she swoops back into my field of vision, effortlessly lifting the hangar-sized bag onto her shoulder and scooping me up in her free hand. There are no words as she places me on her shoulder again, but Scarlett whispers as she moves to her side: "lunch time."

***

The dining hall is the biggest room I've been to yet, and being carried at shoulder height doesn't diminish its epic proportions, with hundred-foot tall schoolgirls of various ages queueing for food and settling down at tables to talk and eat. Scarlett sidles ahead of us and grabs a tray, and I take the chance to whisper to Brittany:

"Are you sure this is safe? I feel awfully exposed up here."

"After the trick they pulled in the corridor back there, I'm not taking any more chances with their light fingers. Just don't fall off and stay quiet. If you're lucky, there'll be enough grub at the edge of my plate for you to eat too."

I look up too late to see if she was smiling at that last comment, but there's a bigger distraction: laid out before me, steaming away behind sheer walls of glass are swimming pools of food, all major food groups covered and in such quantity that I'd never finish them in a year.

Looming over it all is a smiling woman in a dinner lady uniform; unlike all the staff at the school where I grew up, she's fairly trim, if a little old for my tastes. But she's smiling a big smile, with big teeth, and happily chatting away with the girls as they approach to order their food.

She deserves a compliment, just as I deserve a size boost...
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Serving Lunch

choices: This repeated choice is sending me to sleep
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"A marvellous feast, my lady!" I say with a flourish and a bow. "Thank you so much for taking the time to prepare it!"

I stand to my full height, finding it even fuller already. Half again! Three inches?

The dinner lady has seen me all right, her gigantic eyes widening even more behind the magnifying lenses of her glasses, but Brittany is already moving on, the next kid in line ordering food, and I'm in the clear.

"Pretty risky tactic," Brittany confides as she sits, leaning awkwardly at first so that I may scamper down her arm to the the table top.

Then the tray hits, and while Brittany is of course careful enough to keep it from crushing me, I still jump backwards at the noise.

Scarlett's tray is already on the table, and my recoiling brings me closer to it. I watch the outsize food and juicebox for a few moments before a second incredible impact thuds down to my left, and I jump again.

When my eyes consent to opening, I find myself looking at the meaty mass of Scarlett's fist, having smashed down next to me. It's pretty hefty, each individual finger probably weighing more than my entire body, that ring too big to even serve as a hula hoop.

"You weren't kidding," Scarlett's voice mumbles from above through a mouthful of food. "Look how much he's grown compared to my hand!"

I look up to her, mind already composing some caution against nearly crushing me, when her fist becomes a hand, thumb and forefinger effortlessly plucking me up by the waist and lifting me upwards, the second hand hovering a fork in front of her face, slathered in steaming goodness.

Myself, I can't look away from those vast eyes as they sweep over my body, squinting as the giant girl examines her tiny catch.

"Huh, you can almost make out a face now," she grunts. "He's pretty cute."

She doesn't say any more as her lips part to allow the fork to deposit its cargo, and I am absorbed less by her eyes and more by the mouth as it chews over the week's worth of food in one bite, squelching and crunching speaking of the unseen havoc being inflicted behind that face.

There's awe, but something else, as the heat and gushing pulse in that thumb sitting over my crotch invite unwelcome feeling, and I'm blushing as much at that as I am the 'cute' comment. Scarlett seemingly doesn't notice, bored green eyes continuing to take the angles of my head as her jaw pulverises its way through the first step of her meal.

Brittany saves me: "Put him down!" she says. "Don't draw even more attention to him!"

"Sorry, little guy," Scarlett smiles, meaty breath and a few tiny pieces gushing forth as she lowers me to the table, unpinching me and letting me stand on my own two legs.

Brittany has prepared for me already, and the tiny dollop of sauce and a pea the size of my head that she has dropped to the table is more than enough to sustain me. "Careful, Scar," she says, "it's bad enough that he's making a big scene without you helping him!"

"Hey, just checking him out a little before inviting him along to the slumber party. Can't have you bringing strange boys along, Brit!"

They talk sweet nothings above me, and I'm too busy tearing into the tough, giant food to pay much attention. There's another voice that cuts in, unfamiliar and cruel.

"So, what is that thing? Let's have a look, girls?"

I look up to see yet another humungous teenage girl smiling down at me, teeth bright against her dark skin. Her tray is empty, and so is the hand that reaches for me, fingers outstretched as if to blot out the sun.

Brittany's refusal is cut off as her hand envelops me, albeit not as fully as in previous instances, my feet jutting out as my face is smothered within her rock-hard palm. I only gasp for a few moments before I'm released, back into the darkness of the grimly familiar bag of hers.

Looks like I'm drawing a little too much interest, huh? Small comfort in knowing that my tiny body is quite tantalising for teenage girls!

Guess I'll just sit here nice and quiet until school's over, or just nap that meal away? That's what she expects of me! Haven't I been cooped up too long already, though?
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Drea Demands

choices: Leave the room, explore the school
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
Although, all that food, the rough and tumble, I'm tired again? Surely not! I busy myself, examining the objects within the bag new now that I've grown half my height again since my last encounter with them, but it doesn't excite the mind.

The world shifts and rumbles as Brittany transports me with her, but the peeks at her face against the harsh light of the outside world are few and far between. Only once does she pause to whisper to me - "I know this is tough, but hang on. Gym class next, you can stretch your legs there." - not even waiting for an answer before once again lifting free a colossal book with practiced ease. She watches me at the conclusion of each class, carefully avoiding crushing me as she places items back, but that's hardly comfort.

It's a frustrating few hours.

"Stay put for now," Brittany advises as she opens the bag at the start of gym class, "it'll take a few minutes for all the girls to get ready. And be sure to get back in before we get back, okay?"

I don't even have time to nod before her head withdraws from the sky, and I listen to the muted chatter of girls readying themselves for sports. Were they older, I'd be there at the bag's lip spying on them, and the fact that I'm even thinking that means that I haven't fully learned my lesson yet.

Someone tried to snatch me from the bag already, so it may not be safe to stay here long-term - even a short amount of time when Brittany is distracted would be enough for an errant hand to nab me!

Worrying thoughts like that plague me as I take the silence to mean I'm in the clear, and begin my ascent. The climb is refreshing, and as I crest the bag I notice Brittany across the room, standing in a doorway. She smiles and gives both thumbs up before departing, off to exercise those titanic muscles.

I look around at the benches, lockers and discarded bags and clothing of this world, wondering where first to begin my journey. I'm not even limited by this room, if I put my mind to it! If I ever wanted to cut my ties to Brittany, now would be the ideal time for some unsupervised rebellion!
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Gym

choices: Hide under a bench until sure
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
The sights lose their lustre after a while, even if using my super leap to jump between benches adds a little spice. The shoes may be different, but they're all just shoes, and stink enough that I'm loathe to explore inside them. The lockers are impenetrable, the air musty.

Still, it was good to get some exercise, in much the same way that those girls are. I can hear them approaching from some distance, and Brittany's bag is well reachable.

Thing is... should I go there? If Brittany's first through that door, all well and good, no harm done. Should it be Anna, or that girl at lunch, then they could snatch me up in a trice! I could always hide under one of the benches instead, and see how things shake out before heading back to my salvation. That's the safe route, surely.
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Pretty Dull, All Told

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
From my safe spot I can see no more than the feet of these giant girls as they return, crushing footsteps skittering in the studded boots - were they playing soccer? Mud is kicked off in tremendous lumps, and soon there are booms above and around me as prodigious bottoms plop down onto benches.

Ahead, outside the protective boundary of the bench, I see gigantic heels, and then boot toes press into one of them, tremendous force prying the footwear off, freeing a sock-clad foot of epic proportions.

And epic stench. Once freed from its prison, the foot's build-up of sweat from the hour or so of sporty exertion is also released, and the odour hits me full on. I can only begin to gag, but once that foot frees its partner in crime, I'm actively coughing and struggling to breathe.

"Who's that?"

"Sounds like some guy!"

Of course, I realise, as the feet move away and a face slides into view at a right angle, my voice is full-sized! Even my coughs are loud!

I try to run, but the girl's arm snaps out at me, finger and thumb painfully clamping down on my rearmost leg, pulling me up and away, whipping me out into the open air as she stands up.

I'm dangled upside down in front of her face, agony in my ankle and vertigo in my head. It's that same girl from the lunch room, and she's smiling.

"Look at this little perv! What does he think he's doing in here, huh girls?"

I spin gently as she waves me, and I get flashes of other giant faces, shock and laughter warring on them as much as my stomach is demanding to return its contents. That one there, could it be Brittany?

"Give him here, Drea!" she shouts. "He's not a toy!"

"Catch!"

I can't see much as I'm flipped into the air, spinning end over end and definitely losing at least some of my lunch before Drea's other hand clamps tight around me, a new crushing pain.

My imagination is the only record of the conflict outside my fleshy prison, gigantic female teenagers warring over me with blows that could shatter mountains. I cannot see, can feel only pressure and taste only sweat.

Drea's hand opens in time, and I roll out onto the floor to see the girl and Brittany both on their knees, disheveled, breathing heavily. Can I stand? I wonder.

"What are you girls doing?" A more mature voice, distant, getting closer. Large running shoes crash into my field of vision between the fallen juggernauts, supporting the bare, shapely legs of a full-grown woman. The gym teacher?

"The headmistress' office immediately, both of you!" Maybe it's the dizziness speaking, but she sounds hot. And well worthy of a compliment. I stand unsteadily, raising a finger as I clear my throat.

"Fighting over a doll? What were you thinking?" The teacher stoops to snatch me up, a sudden impact knocking me flat unconscious.

My last thought: am I going to see the principal too, or is this woman taking me for herself?
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Dingle Dangle

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"This is the sort of behaviour I find very disappointing in my girls. Are we not setting a good enough example for you?"

I hear the voice first, my ears eager even as my eyes struggle to pry their lids apart. So gentle and enticing, like a female Morgan Freeman.

When vision does finally return, I am lying on my back, looking up at the woman's neatly folded hands as she leans forward across the desk I'm on. She looks past me, above me, clearly at the girls she's lecturing. And while she's younger than the great man she sounds so alike, she casually mimics his assured, commanding posture. Or maybe that's just because I'm three inches tall, lying on the desk in front of her.

"I'd just like a rational explanation for what happened, and we can settle things amicably."

Oh, if that's not a perfect set-up line for me to say my piece, I don't know what is..!
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Stern Lecture

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
Those eyes widen as I first sit up, then stand. My movements catch the woman's attention, and she just blinks as I start to speak.

"I must confess, madam, that the fault lies with me!"

She sits still, ready to take my further words calmly. From her gentle bobbed hair to sensible sweater, the giantess is enraptured. She's clearly old enough to be my mother, but has matured well, her quiet wisdom no doubt contributing to her smooth skin.

"As you can see, I am quite the intriguing person, for my size as well as my personality! No wonder Drea chose to try and possess me for herself - although without my permission! I must thank Brittany for coming to my aid."

I turn to bow at the two giant girls, Brittany smiling while Drea seethes.

"You yourself are due thanks," I say as I return to the host, "for taking the time to listen to my words, and consider all points in this argument. Your graciousness is exceeded only by your beauty."

Yes! Enough to get a rise out of me! In moments I've doubled, now six inches and my injured leg healing in the process! I'm also finding the headmistress capable of speech once again.

"Well, thank you, uh, little man. With that cleared up I think that you and Brittany are free to go..."

"Thank you. It was a genuine pleasure meeting you," I say, extending a hand without thinking. The woman smoothly meets my challenge, extending a pinky finger for me to grip as best I can, careful to keep my arms in their sockets as we shake.

Of course, I could always petition to stay with this lady, surely a safer environment than what Brittany can provide at the moment...
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Authority Figure

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
No, I'm with Brittany for the long haul. I can't abandon her after the beating she took to protect me. She's sporting bruises the size of my head here!

Waving goodbye to the kind headmistress, and sticking my tongue out in the direction of the growling monster Drea, I step onto Brittany's outstretched palm, so much smaller each time.

"I look forward to meeting you in better circumstances," I say to the lady, and to the brat: "No offence, but I hope never to lay eyes on you again!"

Brittany hustles out, hand held to her chest with me sitting between curled fingers. "Did you really have to antagonise Drea like that?"

"I thought you'd be more annoyed that I came onto your principal."

"Why would that annoy me? She's not the one that's going to be gunning for me from now on!"

"Relax! It's the weekend! Friday night and you slumber party, right?"

"You got that right," Scarlett asserts, slipping an arm around Brittany's shoulder as we get outside. "And we'll do our best to forget all about that bitch!"

Her free hand comes down to me, playfully batting at me. "And you at how you've grown! You haven't been talking to strange women, have you?"

"I am now," I return smugly, on top of the world with this latest growth! That's five women down, halfway already!

The joking continues until we get to the bus stop, where I'm unceremoniously dumped into the bag again. "Don't want people seeing you now," Brittany offers as explanation, while Scarlett offers me a tiny finger wave before she falls out of view.

I've had about all I can take of this bag! Once this rocking and rolling movement ceases, I'm getting out of here!
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Bus Home

choices: I'll take up no more of your time!
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
Heh, being six inches tall, I have the strength to actually pull the zipper open! A quick peek shows that no one's watching me, and the chatter of the girls above me is all about the homework that they're going to ignore this weekend.

I step out into the world, the feet of each girl either side. They're still big, but much smaller than previously. I wouldn't want to take a kick from Scarlett, but not too long now before I'll be able to look down on those monstrous toes as merely tiny piggies. Just five more women.

So, I stroll under the bus seat, leaving the girls behind. They'll keep. Wherever will I find a sweet young woman to impress right now? I peek out from under the seat at each bus passenger as I go, delighted to find that this is a public vehicle, not a schoolbus. Adults, not just kids!

The first few are men, and I scramble past their feet quickly enough, eventually finding a delightful pair of what I assume are 'designer' shoes, all angles and buckles, tapering to skinny jeans along some killer legs. The woman they belong to is chatting away carelessly on her 'phone, loudly enough for me to hear at her feet.

"No, no," she says, her voice a delightful, amused trill, "I definitely managed to get it! Spending a week searching would be wasted if I'd just given up!"

Persistent... Is that admirable enough to trigger a growth? I'll listen on...

"That's what you've said before. But the look on her face? C'mon! First time in fifty years... Gram'll be blown away!"

Huh. Going to a lot of effort to do something special for her grandmother! I don't know what it is - and I myself am not so caring as to even speculate - but it's the thought that counts. It's one that deserves recognition.

"So selfless of you to take so much of your own time to help another!" I say, hands boldly on hips as I grow, doubling in height - is this my first full foot?

Two other full feet - in such nice, designer shoes, press down harder onto the floor. "One sec."

The woman leans forward, pushing back the hood of her red sweatshirt to allow long, luxurious black hair to cascade down along with her eyes. "Yeah, little guy? And what's it to you?"

Oh. A little aggressive maybe, but it must be quite a shock to see a foot-tall man at your feet. Um, I should probably apologise. Or maybe just skedaddle.
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Bus Traveler

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"That's right, get lost before I kick your tiny freaky ass out of here!"

For emphasis, the woman makes a mock swing with her boot, and I can't get back under the seats any faster. As she returns to her conversation, and I scuttle past the passengers again, I reflect on the lesson of the day; just because someone seems nice when you first meet them, it doesn't mean they're like that all the time! Are you seeing this, witch? Are you seeing me learn as I grow?

A hand grabs me around the waist, hoisting me into the air awkwardly. "Have you been talking to strange women again?"

"Why, my darling Brittany," I return, folding my arms over the knuckle of her heavy thumb, "why ever would you suspect me of such a misdemeanour?"

"Hm. Could it be because you've somehow become too big for me to properly hold in one hand?" To reinforce this, a second comes up under me to support my legs, allowing me to settle my weight better. "Oh, maybe I'm shrinking! Wouldn't that be terrible!"

"Don't give him such a hard time," Scarlett smiles, with a wink directed at me, "good on him for getting out there and meeting people! Something some other people could learn to do..."

"Regardless, it's dangerous, and it's back in the bag you go," Brittany decrees, and I can do little but splutter as the slightly-less-giant girl tumbles me again. I'm noticing a pattern here.

The bag is getting more cramped every time I get dumped back here, even without no further contents being added. Still boring though, and I instead reflect on those recent faces of anger, humour and worry that I have seen, reflecting on the different emotions I myself have evoked in others. One little dude can make quite the difference.

Does any of this help me with my original predicament, though? Will I be any better at scoring with chicks once I'm full size again? Is chicks considered an offensive term?

The bus journey is quicker than I'd dreaded, and it seems that Scarlett's abode isn't too far from the last stop. I gleefully jump from musky interior to carpeted floor once Brittany opens the bag wide enough for me to escape, and I grin up at her.

"Thank you!"

"Make yourself at home," Scarlett says, casually striding past me. "I'm gonna order us some pizza."

I'm a long way past that time where a mis-placed foot could simply crush me underheel, but even a glancing kick from a thirty-foot woman is going to hurt like Hell, so as I jump to one side I shout out: "Hey! Watch where you're going!"

Brittany stoops, grasping me by my sides, thumbs hooking over my shoulders as she air-lifts me onto the safety of a couch. "Just sit here for a bit, then. And try to relax; nothing can hurt you here! I'll protect you."

"Yeah, with a teenage girl looking out for me, what could go wrong?"

Brittany gives me a glare over her shoulder as she leaves the room. "Whatever. Just sit tight, and we'll be back in a minute."

Well, I take the time to walk up and down the couch a few times, stretching new, longer legs. The decor of this room is quite different from that of Brittany's house, far less studiously organised, for one thing! There are clothes draped over an ironing board in one corner, a number of unwashed plates scattered over the floor - either Scarlett's whole family is rather messy, or she's been left to her own devices for a little while.

The girls return, clearly ready for a sleepover. Brittany is wearing fairly amorphous pyjamas, striped blue, and Scarlett is clad in an outsize man's shorts and t-shirt, some obscure cartoon character winking at me from her chest.

"Don't think we've forgotten you," the latter laughs, her hand shooting forward and a bundle striking me in the chest.

I don't fall, which clues me in to it being pretty light, and I unbundle the doll's size pyjamas. "If you're going to be here, you have to look the part as well, buddy."

Yeah, I'm not going to deny these two girls for fear of them forcibly dressing me, but no way I'm taking off what I'm currently wearing. It's grown with me so far, (magic, I guess) and that property might not pass on to other garments. So, as a compromise, I layer the pyjamas on top of my (somewhat raggedy) regular clothing. I gesture up at Scarlett once I'm done, only to behold an incoming ass, descending rapidly.

"Scooch up a little, give me some room!" Scarlett laughs as she impacts, dust thrown up as she sits, causing me to cough violently. Brittany scoops me up moments later, cradling me almost as a doll in her lap as she sits cross-legged. "She's just kidding, you know. That's what happens at slumber parties."

"Yeah, I haven't been to many of those, you know..."

"It'll be fun!" Scarlett laughs. "My sister trusts me here, and we're totally free!"

"And your parents..?"

The laugh dies on the giant's face, and Brittany quickly raises me to her own face, her voice a thundering whisper. "No parents. We don't talk about that. She lives with her older sister."

The seriousness on that great face shuts me up, and I am lowered once more to the lap, sitting amongst leg ramparts with a comforting hand to recline against.

"Yeah! Girly stuff tonight, and tomorrow we take you out to pick-up chicks!" Scarlett's mood returns almost casually. "Or have them pick you up, I guess. Maybe throw you around a little? We could do that tonight, in lieu of the traditional pillow fight?"

That smile doesn't convince me that she's kidding.

"Geez! Relazx!" A hand moved forward, ruffles my hair roughly. "Tonight, you're one of the girls. At least act like you enjoy it!"

"Tonight is gonna be a blast!" I manage.

"That's the spirit!" A doorbell. "That'll be the pizzas!"

Scarlett leaps bodily to her feet, and dashes for the door, and I'm tempted to follow, to see this pizza delivery person - perhaps even a delivery WOMAN. But that would require prying myself free from Brittany's embrace, and that would hurt her feelings. I don't care about those though, do I?
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Sleepover Trio

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"She can get a little intense," Brittany consoles from above, her hand stroking my mussed hair neatly back into place. "But she's good people. It may not be long before you're able to take care of yourself again, but I'll always be there for Scar."

"Hey, I can look after myself just fine right now!"

"Sure you can!" Brittany laughs, shifting her sitting position ever so slightly and tipping me over. I push myself up from her calf, newly humbled. "Point taken."

"Heads up!" Brittany catches the pizza box neatly, but again that movement sends me tumbling. A new heat intrudes on my world as the food is brought closer, a lid lifted to reveal the greatest sight I've yet seen in this monstrous scale - a veritable field of pizza!

One slice is too much for me to possibly eat! But the smell brings me striding amongst the toppings, snatching a mushroom slice up in one hand to take a bite. For her part, Brittany tears an entire slice free of the strong pull of the cheese, mashing her way through more in a mouthful than I could manage in a month.

Scarlett is similarly ravenous, and while my own pace cannot possibly match there's, I'm no slouch, wandering amongst the scattered toppings, taking what I want and avoiding probing fingers.

The eating slows more as the television rumbles to life, and movies play, big as a cinema to me. Contrary to what I would have imagined, it's not all 'chick flicks'. There's action, there's comedy, there's horror... Who knew that women had just as varied a taste in films as men?

Pizza eventually gives way to popcorn, crunched mightily between teen teeth while I scrape and lick sugar coating from a kernel as big as my head.

It's all jolly enough, but when the movies wind down, the Truth or Dare starts. I guess that some beliefs spring up simply because they're true...

Full fed and lulled to a warm stupor by comfortable surroundings, I barely listen to the words passed between the giantesses, personal secrets and embarrassing revelations of no interest to me.

Then Scarlett's words are directed at me.

"Shorty? Truth or dare, girlfriend?"
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Truth or Dare

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
A dare would lead to this unpredictable girl making me do something embarrassing, possibly even dangerous to such a tiny man. Truth, though? There's nothing she could ask of me that would be bad to reveal. I have no secrets.

"So..." Scarlett rolls the word around in her mouth, then her eyes widen and she smiles at me. She leans in closer, and I'm forced to turn in place to see her snuggle up to Brittany, both girls heads nestled close as they look down at me.

"You're a girl tonight, short stuff, but you're also a man, right? So which of the two of us is the more attractive, in your eyes?"

Scarlett pouts, comically in my eyes, and Brittany gapes, shocked and unable to form a reaction.
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Truth

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"Look, let's not go there, okay? It'll just cause problems, and we're all girlfriends here, yeah? Dare me."

"Hmmf." Scarlett pouts more sullenly, scooping me up in her hands and raising me up to her level. A finger turns my head to look back at Brittany, mouth now closed and blush fading. "How about I dare you to give Brit a kiss? Looks like she could use the cheering up, huh?"

She laughs, but Brittany's response is less positive. She fairly leaps from the sofa, crashing to the ground and running off to the background of Scarlett's laughs and half-hearted insistence that it's 'just a joke'.

I've half a mind to go after the girl, offer some comfort, but then she may need alone time right now. I could just make things worse.

The other half of my mind wants to chastise this tormentor, supposed friend and girl for whom Brittany has shown nothing but care. That half had better be mindful of the fact that the target of that ire currently holds me in her powerful fingers.
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Handheld

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
Scarlett doesn't even make an attempt to prevent me from slipping through her fingers, and I'm relieved to discover that my super-jumps, while proportionally diminished as I've grown, still allow me to make the drop to the ground harmless.

She continues to sit back, possibly watching my comically small form scramble across the floor after Brittany, the thick textures of the carpet impeding me more than I'd hoped, than I'd imagined.

I'm coming to the front door, a corridor - a world almost - away from where I began, when the immense edifice creaks open, a newcomer entering quietly, stepping out of the night. I say quietly, but as that booted foot steps inside, it crashes down before me with enough force to bring me skidding to a halt.

Scarlett's sister - for who else could it be? - is beautiful, no doubt about it. Compensating for seeing her face from an awkward angle, it's finely boned, with a skintone that perfectly sets off that long, dyed-red hair. The coat covers medical scrubs, a most admirable profession. I smell a compliment-worthy woman!

But Brittany...
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Opportunity Knocks

choices: No, I have a better idea!
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"Look at you," I begin, buying myself time to think up the best phrasing, "dedicated to saving lives, all while caring for your sister all by yourself. Admirable, really."

Yes, that's growth! That distant face gets a bit closer as my own eye level crawls somewhere above her knee, but the full effect is spoiled when that knee draws back, allowing the leg to deliver a kick to my chest.

Three more from full-size, but a woman's kick breaks something in me, hurling me backward and bringing all to black.

I come to on a table, three mildly worried females looking down at me - even Scarlett isn't as jovial as usual! Her sister smiles at my consciousness, standing a bit further back and folding her arms.

"Hi there. My name's Fay, and I'm sorry for what happened. It's just, I heard a strange man's voice in my home at night and just lashed out. Now that these two have explained everything, well..."

"You're lucky that my sister is a doctor, basically," Scarlett says.

"You're okay now," Brittany says, reaching down to lift me, to cradle me like a baby to her chest. "I'm so, so sorry for causing all this -"

"No," I cut her off, struggling to push myself from her shoulder. What am I, two feet tall now? "Never blame yourself for anything. All that's happened, it's on me, my choices. Although, you could do with hugging me a little less tightly..."

"Yes," Fay adds, moving in to loosen Brit's grip with a hand on her wrist. "I've patched you up, but I'd go careful - your chest will still be sore for a while."

Brit looks me in the face as she relents, and I see the dried tears there. "Oh, don't worry about that, Fay. Every time I get a new growth spurt, my wounds kinda re-knit themselves away? I'm always in pristine condition afterwards. One good part of this, I suppose."

"Speaking of growing," Brit smiles, finally setting me down on the table, where standing I'm almost among peers, only having to crane my neck slightly.

"I still have Scarlett's old pram around here somewhere," Fay says. "Tomorrow, the girls can take you around in it, like a baby -"

"You are baby-sized," Scarlett interjects.

"Yes. And when women inevitably walk over to look at you, you can hit them with a comment and BAM! Or, whatever noise it is."

Hmm, what do I think of this plan?
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Why Waste the Chance?

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
Yeah, I have to admit that this is better than me walking. That would draw too much attention, and there's no way that either girl could carry me around all day. At two feet tall, I'm getting WEIGHT.

The sides of the pram cut off much of my world view, and most of my time is spent looking up at the face of whoever is pushing me along. Fay is working all weekend, so the two girls take it in turns, Brit smiling when she gets the chance, Scarlett instead sticking her tongue out when she catches me peeking. Each time, I pull the covers tighter over me, glad for their warmth. My small size means I retain less heat, and even on a warm day like this, denied the warming closeness of a full-size human I shiver.

So far, it's been old ladies that pop by to squeeze my cheeks and coo over me. Elderly grandmothers don't exactly do it for me, so at those times I've had to smile and bear it, and suffer through Scarlett's mocking afterward. Their eyesight has been poor enough that they haven't noticed my non-baby proportions, and instead say how cute I look, the most beautiful baby they've seen.

Insincere. Not compliment worthy.

Now, it's a young mother looming over me, backlit by sunlight, halo-ing her soft face. To my shame, I notice that her bosom is most prominent as it dangles above me, and it takes an effort of will to tear my eyes from her swaying, low-cut chest.

"Not yours, I take it?" she smiles. "He's got a very clever look about his eyes, doesn't he?"

She's complimenting me! To repay that would be egotistical, not nice, right? 'Good taste, lady!' is not gonna get me some growth, is it?

"Doesn't look too comfortable there, though. May I?"

I can't hear the response, and I'm in shock as this gorgeous, gigantic woman reaches down to pick me up, expert hands carefully shuffling me into a comfortable baby-cradling. I react to that warmth I've been missing, clutching tightly in return, my grip clearly noticeable. "Oh! There, there," the woman says, rocking me back and forth. "Everything's all right, don;t be scared of the strange lady... See girls, you might have a lot to learn before you start raising kids of your own. No kid likes being in the pram for so long - it's pretty boring."

She's not wrong.

"Every now and then, take them out, let them get a little air, see your face -"

She lifts me, holding me away from her and before her face, that wonderful, kindly face, smiling at me and making sound-shapes. Now, in the open, in the light, my adult form must be apparent to her. Eyes widen, mouth freezes in mid-burble.

Now's my time to act.
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: We Have A Plan

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"Don't be alarmed," I begin, not wanting to be dropped on my head, "and just listen. You're a wonderful person, with a great heart. So open, so friendly, so nurturing. I'm sure you're a fantastic mother."

To her credit, the woman does not drop me, but as I suddenly surge in height - three feet total? - forces her to lower me, my body no longer baby-light.

"Oh my God," she stutters, backing away from me. "What is this?"

"Don't freak out," Brit says, calming hand motions evident. "It's really quite simple."

The woman has her phone out, and is making a call, worried eyes darting between me and Brit.

"Don't just stand there!" Brit shouts. "Run!"
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Alarm Raised

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
I run. It's a park, families roaming along pathways, joggers and cyclists taking their exercise, dogs being walked. Everywhere, giants who are bound to be weirded out by a three foot tall shrunken man.

A detour, then. Into those trees, where no one will follow. The undergrowth is thick, but I'm small, so I can leap past roots in ways that a larger person wouldn't. I'm like a kid, and I still have the slightest amount of increased jumping capacity in me, so it's easy.

And refreshing. Just to run, with no care as to destination, no worries for consequence or peril.

The trees clear, but there are still large, tall shapes looming over me within that space. Teenage girls, sitting or standing together in a dappled glade, discarded bottles, cans and cigarette packets around.

I breathe heavily after my exertions, and the half-dozen or so giantesses can't fail to hear me. They rise, turn and gape at me. Two among their number are slightly less shocked, resentment replacing it. Drea and Anna snarl as they recognise me, the former crushing an empty beer can in her fist.

"Oh, look who it is. A little bigger now, huh? Now you're done getting me in trouble with the principal?"

The girls take courage from their leader, walking to form a circle around me. I've been the size of an insect, under threat of being crushed underfoot constantly, yet never have I felt more in danger than this present moment, surrounded by teenage girls only a foot or so taller than me. They're intoxicated, unpredicatable, and clearly unhappy to see me.

"Too good to play with me," Anna says, stepping forward. I try to back away, but powerful arms pin me from behind, each teen out-muscling me. Anna lays her huge hands on me far more gently, tracing the outlines of my face with massive fingers. She imagines a gentle caress no doubt, but either intoxication or an underestimation of strength rips her skin contours across me like sandpaper.

Then she kisses me, forcing her monstrous lips onto mine, tongue prying me open to explore with a brutality that leaves me gasping once she pulls away.

"You're welcome," she slurs, taking a pull from her cigarette.

"He doesn't deserve anything that nice," Drea thunders, stomping forward. Before I have a chance to express my own disagreement over just how 'pleasant' that previous experience was, she's laying into me with her fist, each blow opening new damage where my previous rib-cage had healed. She's shouting at me all through, calling me names, clearly drunk.

She paces herself well, although the two restraining me have released me as they realise the brutality they're witnessing; quite sobering, I imagine. "Won't someone help me?" I whimper.

"I do think you've gone too far, Drea," one girl speaks up. "This was meant to be a little joke, and you're killing him-!"

"Shut up. It's not as if he's a person, is it? He's some tiny little guy, some toy of Brit's, and we're playing along. Okay?"

There's a moment here, where I could escape if I'm quick enough...
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Creepy

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
I'm back into the trees, leaping and climbing, using my small size as best I can to escape the nightmare teenagers. Pursuit is not immediate, so I imagine some disagreement between Drea and her peers has held her back, buying me time.

I purchase some more myself, forcing my shattered body to change direction, doubling back in a direction contrary to where they'd imagine me to go. I don't think my light form is leaving much in the way of a trail, and those girls are pretty wasted anyway, so I think it should work...

Emerging from the treeline, I find sunlight illuminating a woman strolling along, pushchair containing a baby. The child gurgles at me, no doubt amused to see a man almost as small as she is. I don't know why I thought to wave to her, inviting a laugh and a hand-clapping.

The woman herself hustles over to me, her long skirt throwing me into shade before she stoops, halfing her height and bringing herself down to my level. Concern on her face, she's quite different to that last woman I saw, her eyes flickering over the bruises I imagine cover my body.

"Are you all right? Who did this to you! Where are your parents?"

"Thanks for the worry," I manage through puffy lips. "But your care is better off elsewhere. I'm okay on my own, believe me." I meet those large, blue eyes of hers, and do my best to smile. "Just knowing you're thinking of me will be enough."

And I grow, rising above her. She stands again, and I find that she's still clearly at least a head taller than me. One more, that's all I need. One more, and I can reclaim my old life, casting away all these people I've met over the last week, and incorporating my lessons into an improved manner of picking up girls.

Abandon Brittany, embrace a life with love ahead...
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Penultimate

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
I run again, my injuries vanished, no explanation for the woman or her baby. The child does gurgle, maybe a farewell, but I'm beyond caring.

It's a few minutes, passing those simple park goers out and about on their Saturday morning walks, before I find what I'm looking for.

She reclines on a park bench, reading a book on her lap. She has an exotic look, an uncommon dress sense complimenting that, defying the conventional fashions so prominent in this conservative environment. Bold.

I sit next to her, having to do a little jump to haul my tiny form alongside. "Whatcha readin'?"

Eyes hooded, she flicks the cover in my direction. I can't say that I've read it, and it looks pretty heavy stuff from the lack of illustration on the cover. "For college, or personal enjoyment?"

"Can't it be both?" she mutters, struggling to read with my distraction. "The themes within are relevant to the entire human condition, but the satire makes it readable."

"So cool to meet someone interested in true literature," I say. "Not just skim-reading this stuff, but finding enjoyment in a calling. I'll bet your paper will be fascinating."

She gives me full attention at that point, but slowly enough that she misses my final growth, my original height restored. Inside, I'm jumping for joy at my torment being over, and this woman seems genuinely interested in me, but as she scooches slightly over, my heart sinks.

She seems so small! I'm looking down at her, and that book is held in such dainty fingers! It's unnatural. Women should be bigger than me, should be powerful, intimidating figures!

She offers me a smile, tiny, insignificant teeth gleaming, but I'm already rising and backing off. What's happened to me? Why am I not seeing the joy in this meeting?

The woman rises, worried. "What is it?"

No, this won't do. I'm running again, away from her, away from everyone. But I'm trapped, stuck in this world of tiny people, freakishly small.

If only I could find that witch, she could make me small again, make me find a place I belong! I've learned my lesson, and she'll help me! If only I can find her, and I'd better not stop searching, looking, desperate for another pick-up challenge...
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: All I Ever Wanted

1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
"As you can see, I'm okay," I assure the woman, demonstrating how the growth has healed all my ills. "Carry on, don't worry. There's someone I've got to catch up with."

I give her a nod, the baby another wave, and I'm jogging off. Brittany! I'd almost entirely forgotten about her, and I'd left her with that woman that was troubled and calling for help. I increase my pace.

The park isn't one that I'm familiar with, and it takes me a while to get my bearings, especially considering that I saw none of the route while I was pram-bound!

I hear Brit before I see her, calling my name. I reply, and we meet on the pathway. Scarlett and pram are nowhere to be seen, and as I run to the girl, I find that I'm precisely her height. So close to the final spurt...

This leaves the girl slightly bulkier than me, her outsize presence slightly odd, but she smiles and hugs me, powerful arms gently emphasising her relief.

"One more," I tell her.

"Great! So, where shall we look for..."

I shake my head, and she stops looking around. "Huh?"

"I want it to be you."

"What?"

"I love you," I tell her, honest realisation surprising me as much as her. It's not physical, not for this teenage girl, but her personality has struck a chord, ringing as clear in my ears as my voice in hers.

"Really?" she stammers. Her eyes continue to stare into mine, my height not increasing.

"I can't grow, because you're too young. But I don't want to grow that final foot without you. I want it to be you that I see when I reach the end of this journey."

It's a beautiful sentiment, and at that point I don't realise the work that it entails. Staying clear of the world, sheltering with Brittany and her family in secret, each day reminding her of my feelings, years passing in solitude and loneliness.

The day that the curse broke, when the girl had become a woman and we embrace as one, I still think as the happiest of my life. The witch's magic had preserved me, and I grow back to my original form, as if no time has passed since that first shrinking. The age gap, therefore, isn't so distant as one may imagine.

It's still strange, I admit that freely, but as I explain this story to you, my child, I hope that you can see past the facts of my challenge to the lessons that they taught me, for without the challenge of a giant world I would never have met your mother, and you would not have been born.
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Destiny?

choices: Complete the circuit of the house
Run off elsewhere to look for help
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.content:
As my foot-long form sits in Scarlett's hands, I seethe as she laughs. That was very hurtful. Poor Brittany had done nothing to deserve that. I tell her so.

"That right?" she replies, smile and humour falling instantly from her face as it comes closer to me. "I'm her friend. I know her better than some little jerk that fell into her life a couple days ago. And since I'm her friend, I won't be asking her to pay the forfeit."

Wait, what? But the words won't form as Scarlett's platform hands switch to clutching claws, holding me tight. "No, it would be too cruel to ask her to do a circuit of the house naked. But you're a big boy, you can take it."

Again, any protest I make loses coherence as her fingers pluck at my garments, effortlessly tearing them from me. All too soon I'm stripped to my underwear - the girl's definition of 'naked' thankfully not literal - with my only warmth afforded by the powerful grip around me. Scarlett saunters to the window, dragging it open and dropping me into the cold and darkness.

"One circuit of the house - meet me back here and you can hop right back in."

I shiver, and think that a simple run around the perimeter will seem more than five times as long to me. And who knows what cats or other creatures may be lurking in the darkness? Is this the snapping point hat shows me I was wrong to trust my life to some girls?
1113311212122111111222222211121221211222.title: Survival Tip: Don't Scold the Giantess

choices: Jump to the grass and run off
11133112121222.content:
"You're normally such a good girl," the voice continues, "so you must have a good reason for cutting class."

"Of course, Miss Curtis!" Brittany stammers, standing as she speaks and pressing me into her palm with nothing more than the force of her ascent. "I'm on my way back to class right now."

"That's not a reason," Miss Curtis says, and while my view of her is obscured by the immense fingers of Brittany, there's no disguising her voice. Such a delicious, velvety purr... Huh, the witch never specified how I found a woman attractive; a voice alone could be enough. "But run along for now, and don't lose any more time! We'll talk about this later!"

Hell with it; I take a chance. "Very kind of you, Miss Curtis!"

I say hello to my second inch of height while Brittany stops in place. I collapse again, and now Miss Curtis is getting closer, her voice growing in volume. "What was that? Do you have your phone on speaker, Brittany?"

Well, with two women down this may be the time to get out of here. On the other hand though, if you leave Brittany here she'll be in all sorts of trouble. The gentlemanly thing to do would be to stya here and face the music with her!
11133112121222.title: Busted

111331121212222.content:
I can’t leave this girl in the lurch. Time to reveal myself. Kind of.

“I’m no speaker phone,” I say. “I’m a state-of-the-art toy. I’m the latest model of the Tama...gamatchamu.” Whatever it’s called. “I guess you’ll just have to confiscate me like a good authority figure.”

Brittany’s hands slowly part open, revealing the gorgeous face of Miss Curtis. Wow. I can tell why she teaches at an all-girls school. No teen boy would be able to focus on a thing with her around.

The giant redheaded teacher stares at me, agape, but she composes herself. “I’ll take that. You get yourself back to class right now, young lady.”

I see the look of hesitation on Brittany. Kinda hard to miss on a face that large. I nod, and she places me on the palm of the teacher‘s hand. Miss Curtis promptly slips me into the hip pocket of her long, professional skirt.

I feel the fabric tighten and relax as she walks back inside the school. The question, now, is: Do I slip out and make my way back to my giant teenage friend? Or do I hang out with the hottest teacher I’ve ever seen?
