111331121212222.title: I'm a Tamaga-whatever!

11133112122.content:
Nah, I don’t want to experience another episode of denial. I’ll let this girl take me out of the building, and then I can get to a more grown-up world.

Some sunlight peeks through the fingers enveloping me, and I feel myself being lowered.

The hands open up, and there’s a grass field a safe hop away, so I jump down before this girl gets a good look at me.

I land in the midst of thick grass blades that tower over me, and I look up to find something that makes them seem absolutely tiny. The humongous teen girl turns and walks away. Her magnificent size makes her a truly impressive sight, and I say this with no lust whatsoever, honest. Giant people are just pretty damn fascinating to look at, that’s all, especially in motion.

But I don’t want to look at them forever, so now I’ve got to figure a way out of this jungle and back to civilization.

Of course, as my luck would have it, before I take my first step, I hear an ominous sound...
11133112122.title: The Great Outdoors

choices: Get out while the going's good
Stay around to talk to the class teacher
111331121222.content:
The girl's footsteps are distant, gone, but I can recognise the tempo of a human walking. And realise that the sound I hear is the same, magnified over a dozen times. People are coming, and here I am in the middle of a grass field! I'm going to be trampled unless I get out of here!

I look about for a way out, and as I turn my head I see that this isn't grass that I'm standing amongst. Those big, green leaves widen out as they rise to form the canopy above me. I'm no plant-expert, but those look like they belong to some root vegetable or other. As I stagger through the unfamiliar jungle, I spot other, differing plantforms, and monolithic street signs announcing what lies in each row of this neatly tilled...

...garden.

Of course, that girl wasn't going to dump me on the school sports field! She's put me somewhere that an insect can thrive...

I'm not going to get stepped on, but that crowd of approaching schoolgirls is going to be digging up this area, putting the greatest construction sites in history to shame! Time for a sharp exit!

The sun is blotted out, and a number of girlish figures loom overhead in all directions, just as tall as the one that dropped me off here. Greater still, the statuesque from of their teacher, her golden hair shining in the sunlight...

Oh, if I leave now I won;t get a chance to introduce myself to my future wife!
111331121222.title: In The Garden

choices: The soil is placed into a plant pot
The soil is brought back down on a newly-planted tree
The soil is tossed aside onto a heap
1113311212221.content:
Yup, definitely time to get going! As the school girls tower overhead, blocking all view of the sun with their titanic forms, I begin running. When the frontmost girl falls to her knees before the garden, the resultant shockwave sends me skidding through the dirt.

I push myself up, but then more and more of the girls sink down to inspect the plants, pounding the ground almost unceasingly with their vast masses. Good thing they want to keep clear of these plants, otherwise I could be at ground zero of a schoolgirl apocalypse!

I end up dragging my sorry ass through the dirt like a worm, all too aware that any attempt to stand will result in me just falling over again. Try as I might to ignore the impacts and voices of the monsters above me, the aural assault is impossible to resist. Even if I spoke up now, short of shouting, no-one would hear me!

Clear of the majority of old plant growth, I find myself looking across a field of dirt, a great expanse where I could just make a run for it! So I get up, I get my legs pumping, and I sprint flat-out for freedom.

The universe has others ideas. A wall of metal smashes down in front of me, a pointed edge scything down into the earth before me, driven by the invincible power of the hand holding it. Unable to stop, I slam into the face of the trowel as it digs into the ground, and I'm right there with the great heap that is carried heavenwards by the schoolgirl owner.

Sparing a glance across at the invincible might of that girl, I grip tight to the crumbling mountain of dirt as she heaves it away - but for what purpose?
1113311212221.title: Can You Dig It?

I can jump knee-high, but that table's a bit higher...

Hmm...That pretty girl is about to walk by...Maybe I can jump up, grab her pants leg and spring off of there, and then it's up, up, and away!

Grab!

Hey. Fabric's really easy to grab at this size. And I'm clinging to some random girl's pants. Weird.

Yes! Perfect dismount! At the nearest edge of the table! Made it by like a milimeter. Good thing I'm hardly bigger than that...

But it'll be more fun to ride the train...And here it comes...

There's nothing to grab onto. This isn't going to go well...

At least it was fun for those few seconds...

The train rounds a corner, and a light gust of air is just enough to send my tiny body flying through the store. I really have no sense of perspective...I don't know how far I'm flying...But pretty soon I'm going to have to land somewhere. This may be the best fall I've ever had, landing on this pleasant expanse of blue fabric, beneath which beats the heart of this gorgeous woman. Of course, slightly closer to me than that mighty organ are her -

That.) that shows a deep understanding of the various ranges peddled by her store, and an appreciation of what children look for in their playthings. "That was very considerate of you," I say, looking upward to the underside of the woman's chin. "You clearly love your job."

Her head moves from side-to-side, wondering where the voice came from, and as it does so, it shrinks. No, I'm getting bigger! The witch wasn't lying after all! I've almost doubled in size! Maybe this newfound stature is why I feel the urge to intervene when the manager comes over, lambasting the lovely lady for not doing her best to push the latest range of overpriced, shoddy mechandise that the store has in. This isn't the first time, and the lovely lady
11211.title: Ka-Ching!  Sale!

choices: there's another hottie, coming your way
112111.content:
“Hey! You!” I yell at the store manager. He just kind of stares around blankly, trying to find out were the voice is coming from. “Yeah, I’m talking to you! Don’t you dare chastise this lovely lady for doing her job! I bet she’s made more sales than you ever have! I mean, seriously, haven’t you ever heard of ‘customer service’?”

“Who’s saying that?!” the man yelled, spinning around to find the source of the insulting voice. I was actually having some fun with this! That is until he spotted me. Oh, crap…

“W…what is that thing?” Oh, so now I’m a thing. Interesting how people don’t have very good eyesight. Nevertheless, I stay perfectly still, as there were now two giants staring at me. Thankfully, the woman looked up and started talking.

“Sir, there’s nothing there, and I would really appreciate it if you would stop pointing at, well, my…” the woman said.

The manager seemed to snap back to reality. He lowered his hand and cleared his throat. “Yes, well, um, get back to work.” He turned and walked away, seemingly confused.

Once the manager was out of sight, the woman named Cindy looked down at me and smiled. “Well, little man, I have to thank you for getting rid of my manager, but I have a few questions I would like to ask you.”

Hmm, I’ve already doubled in size from her. Should I stay and talk, or bolt and find another woman?
112111.title: Speak in the woman's defense

1121111.content:
Cindy brings her hand near the nametag: It looks like she has a "Q & A" segment with me. I do not mind answering a few questions, but if they are question, after question, I will climb down the shirt, down the tan pant leg, and slide off the woman's sandal.

Cindy begins with her first question: "How did you end up on my name tag? Moreover, how did you get to small?"

How should I respond to these questions?
1121111.title: Okay, will talk, over a thimble of water

11212.content:
So I'm on a giant shirt. I realize that much right away, but the sight I get looking up leads me to believe I'm not actually on a person.

The ground's not too far below, so I hop down and find myself standing before a giant teddy bear in a t-shirt and silly hat. So I guess I'm on some shelf?

"That is so cute!"

That's definitely a female voice. I turn around, and there's this young 20-ish woman bending down to look at this stuffed bear. I really can't get a good look at her body from where I am, but her face may as well be on a jumbo-tron.

And it's a nice face. And she's got nice, long hair. But what I notice most of all is the eyes...both of them many times bigger than I am, and they're not too far above--especially compared to what I've been used to for the past several minutes.

Those are kind eyes. She's no witch.

This also isn't the store worker. This is some other young woman. And as I watch her smile at this toy and delight in such a simple, innocent pleasure, I find myself thinking:

She's kind of cute.

I should say something to her...
11212.title: Cute

choices: Go find the pretty store worker.
112121.content:
I need to say something, despite my tiny self. I don't know how this is going to work out, but I really have nothing to lose.

What to say? Think fast...She's not going to admire the bear forever. Once she stands up to full height, the opportunity's lost.

I guess I'll just be honest. I say, "Uh, hi! You're kind of cute!"

Is it the best pick-up line ever? I don't know. I'm still learning. But I had to say something.

As soon as I speak, the girl seems to get confused. She doesn't notice me, but she obviously heard something, so she stands up and turns around, I guess trying to find the source of the soft voice that addressed her.

And then most of my field of vision is filled with her giant ass, and I admit, if I were normal, it looks like it would be slightly bigger than my usual preference.

Yet, I remember her face and eyes as she admired the bear, and I find myself still thinking that she's a cute, attractive girl.

She turns back around and stares down, first at the bear, and then her eyes wander toward me for just a second. She leans down just a bit.

"Wha--?" Then she stands back up and walks away. "No..."

And she's off, apparently finding the notion of a tiny man to be ludicrous.

Hmm...I feel odd...I think...Yeah, everything's gotten just a bit smaller--It's all still enormous, but I'm not quite as tiny.

I'm estimating, but I think I just grew from something like two milimeters to maybe an entire centimeter.

I'll take it.

One down, nine to go. So where to now?

choices: Speak your mind to the mean girl!
Wait for the mean girl to leave.
1121211.content:
So that's progress. Wasn't too hard. Now I can find that store worker, talk to her, and who knows? Maybe I'll actually be multiple inches tall by the time I leave this place. Wouldn't that be nice?

Aha! That pretty worker's straightening merchandise right along this same wall of shelves I'm standing on. She's just a short walk away for me.

As I approach, I notice how she's shrunk a bit, from my perspective. Now instead of being incomprehensibly huge, she's merely impossibly huge. But she's still got a finely proportioned figure.

I'm right near her now, staring ahead at her waist. But her focus is on some shelf above me. Do I need to climb? Oh, Lord, please don't make me have to climb. I'm no mountain-climber...I could so fall to my death...

Wait. Waaaaiiittt...

What do we have here? Another beautiful girl is in this store. I guess I didn't see her enter, as I've been concentrating on these other girls. How did I not notice her? She looks perfect...like she should be a super-model.

The super-model girl approached the worker and snaps, "Hey! Excuse me! I'm talking to you!"

That...was not pleasant.

The petite worker turns to the super-model and stands about a hundred feet shorter...or probably like six or seven inches in real people's perspective.

"I'm sorry," the worker says. "How can I help you?"

That's a sexy voice. And a kind voice.

The super-model holds up a bag and complains, "I bought this for my niece's birthday, and it broke, like, right away! I want my money back!"

And she goes on and on, whining and treating the worker like she's subhuman.

That's...not really attractive. Not at all. That's disappointing. I'm really enjoying my view of her chest...and her hips...

But it's really annoying me how she's treating that other girl...And she can't really fight back, because "the customer's always right," as this witchy girl has mentioned a few times now. Ugh.

You know, maybe I can use my tiny size to mess with her...I've still got most of my voice, after all...
1121211.title: Two different kinds of beauty

I'm feeling daring. Maybe I'm overcompensating for being not even an inch tall, but I want to do something bold.

"Hey, thunder thighs!" I yell up to the mean young woman. "What's your problem?"

Both girls acquire expressions of pure bewilderment, as neither sees anyone else in the store just then.

I simply continue, "I don't know what your problem is, but there's no reason to take it out on this nice young lady here. You need to treat her with more respect!"

Now, they both spot me, standing on the shelf, about waist-level with the nice store worker and a bit lower to the taller, much more evil customer.

Oh, damn. I've been spotted by two giants. Not one, but two.

I admit, this is a bit scary. But I'll only admit that to myself, not to another living soul. Scared of girls, good God, what have I been reduced to?

The obnoxious customer leans down to confirm to herself what she's seeing. Most of what I'm seeing now is her wide, green eyes hovering right over me, examining my miniature self. Her jaw's out of my field of vision, but I'm sure it's dropping.

Deep breaths...She might not kill me...Just keep talking...

"Yeah, I'm a teeny tiny man," I say. No, wait... "I'm your real-life Jiminey Cricket, here to serve as your conscience! And your conscience says that you need to stop acting like a bitch!"

"You are real," she says. "Holy sh--"

"Your conscience says, watch the language!" I call back. Hmm...Idea for a new tactic! "You're probably wondering if you're going crazy, and the answer is yes, you are going crazy. You're losing your mind as punishment for being such a mean person!"

Confused as hell, she shoots back up to her full height and mutters to the worker, "I--I need to go....Bye..."

As she starts to walk away, I can't resist calling out, "Oh, and while you're working on becoming a better person, you might want to hit the gym. Look at how huge your ass is! It's bigger than my entire self! Get on a treadmill, girl!"

Actually, I've never seen a more perfectly shaped butt, especially in that miniskirt, but I'm not giving her the satisfaction. Anyway, she knows she's hot. But with her, it's not enough.

She glances down at me one last time, clearly having no clue what to make of me.

Oh, please please please don't swat me!!!!!

She's rushing out the door! Whew! Crisis averted!

So now it's just me, and a very cute and very gigantic girl...a cute giant girl who's already seen me...

“Oh, my good Lord,” Sadie says. “It’s...her!”

And it is her. It’s Barbie. She’s roughly the same height as us, and dressed in a martial arts outfit.

The witch says, “And that’s not just any Barbie. She has the combined knowledge of every Barbie that’s ever been sold in the history of Barbies. Horseback-riding Barbie, Astronaut Barbie...Karate Barbie. It’s time you learned to respect the Barbie.”

Super-Barbie stares at us with her stiff plastic face. Her frozen smile is just creepy.

We’re going to have to do battle with Barbie, aren’t we?
112121111112222.title: Taller

1121211111122222.content:
The only problem here is that I don’t really know how to fight. I certainly don’t know how to fight a fake plastic woman.

“Step aside,” Sadie says, as she launches into a roundhouse kick that topples Barbie.

The animated doll hops right back to her feet and throws her fist at Sadie, who blocks the attack with her arm and returns an even more powerful blow to Barbie’s face.

“Ow,” Sadie says, shaking her hand. “Punching plastic hurts.”

Barbie returns with a side kick, which Sadie blocks with one leg before thrusting her other foot right into Barbie’s midsection. This girl knows her martial arts.

“That’s really hot,” I tell her, immediately realizing how stupid I sound. I might as well have just drooled.

In-between trading blows, Sadie says, “I’ve got Barbie here. Best way you can help me out is to talk some sense into that witch. Or talk to someone else so I can get the height advantage.”

I’d love to watch this fight, but she’s right. This isn’t a game. This is my responsibility. I’m not going to let the girl save the day all by herself.

I’m going to...
1121211111122222.title: Sadie vs. Barbie

choices: "...start the challenge over at ant size."
11212111111222221.content:
I’m going to give this witch a piece of my mind! Yeah, that’s what I’m going to do!

While Sadie keeps Barbie busy (oh, Lord, what a day it’s been), I run over to witch woman, who’s still sitting on that stool with her amused grin.

“Hey, Bigfoot!” I say. Okay, that’s as far as I’ve thought ahead here...

She hops off her stool and crouches down to my level. She may look much smaller than she did at first, but she still looks much bigger than a human being should, probably forty feet tall. But hey! That’s shorter than a certain B-movie icon, so what’s there to be afraid of?

She snatches my leg and lifts me up. I dangle upside-down, as she rests her big head on her other arm. “Yes, Dollman?” she says.

“Okay, look, you don’t like me, fine. Take it out on me. That girl over there has no part in this. You wanted me to learn respect for women, right? Then how about you practice what you preach?”

The witch stands up, pulling me along with her. She juggles me back and forth between her two hands as she ponders my words. It would almost be fun, except I don’t think she cares whether or not she drops me...

Then she stops. She wraps one hand around my waist and holds me in front of her face.

“That’s a fair point,” she says. But she still has that grin, so I’m not optimistic. “I’ll restore the young lady to her proper size, but, and there’s a big but here--”

“You mean yours?”

“Don’t make me reconsider. I’ll restore her, if you agree to...”
11212111111222221.title: Hey, Bigfoot!

112121111112222211.content:
“...start the challenge over at ant size,” she tells me.

“So I shrink back down, and Sadie grows back up? So basically I just have to talk to an additional four women, that what you’re saying? Simple as that?”

“Not so simple,” the witch says with a smirk. “This time, you won’t have a normal voice. And I think I’ll take away that leaping ability that made it easier to get around as an insect.”

She’s insane. And she still has be firmly in her grasp. “Then how am I supposed to talk to any girls if they can’t hear me, especially if I’m so small they can barely see me? I wouldn’t stand a chance.”

The witch glances beyond me to where Sadie continues her struggles against Super-Barbie. And she’s not doing well. Barbie’s got her pressed against the floor, and she’s choking her. Oh, God, that doll might actually kill her...

“Do you think she stands much of a chance?” the witch asks, chuckling. “Time’s a-wasting. Do you want to shrink, or do you want your new friend to perish at less than a foot tall at the hands of a toy?”
112121111112222211.title: Here's the deal...

1121211111122222111.content:
"Fine! Just leave her alone!"
That b**** smirked and snapped her fingers. Immediately Super-Barbie released Sadie and fell to the ground, limp and lifeless. The witch dropped me and I fell to the ground, landing on my back. I rolled to my feet in time to see the witch start growing. Then I was back to being incomprehensibly small. I stared up at the Sear’s Tower-sized witch. She crouched down to look at me with that blasted smirk on her face.
“Have fun little man!” she said, laughing and walked away. I would have liked to say a few coarse words to her, but she wouldn’t have heard me anyways. Now what am I going to do? Sure, I just saved Sadie’s life, but now I’m ant-sized and I have to find a way to communicate with four more women, or is it four? Did the challenge start over or did it just continue? Ok, ok…I’ve got to focus, come up with a plan. I can’t panic now, I mean, I got this far right? I can do this again.
Just then I felt the ground tremble from an earthquake. Well, actually it was now normal-sized-Sadie getting up off the ground and rubbing her neck where the Barbie had tried to strangle her. She looked down at the doll and stomped on it until its arms and legs popped out of the sockets. With each of her footfalls, I was knocked off my feet and onto my butt, bouncing across the ground. I stood up on my feet to see Sadie get down on her hands and knees and start searching the ground for me. Hey, she actually cares about me! Cool! Maybe if I every get out of this situation I’ll ask her out. She sure is hot…
I was snapped back to reality as her hand landed near me, knocking me (again) onto my backside. I jumped to my feet and started waving my arms and calling her name, which was really stupid since my voice was proportionate to my body. Her hand lifted up again and started coming down…straight for me! There was no way I could avoid it. Oh, man, this was not the way I wanted to die!
1121211111122222111.title: Accept the deal.

11212111111222221111.content:
Never thought it would be death by humongous hand for me. But I’m a minuscule fraction of an inch tall with no way to communicate with anyone, and I can’t even move swiftly anymore. Really, how long did I expect to last like this? Well, I was hoping I'd make it at least a little longer, you know, for my pride and all...

I guess the important thing is that I saved Sadie’s life, even if her meeting me was the only reason she was in jeopardy in the first place. But she’s safe and big again and...really, really big.

As her hand presses down on me, one last thought flashes across my mind:

I wonder if she’ll ever realize she killed me.
11212111111222221111.title: Huge hand

11212111111222221112.content:
And here it comes, the moment where my miserable life ends, at the hand of a beautiful girl…literally. This was definitely not the way I imagined I would kick the bucket, but I never really imagined being shrunk down to the size of an ant. It wasn’t like it was on my list of things to do before I died… #23. Go skydiving…#24. Write and publish a novel…#25. Be shrunk by a witch…

Yep, the last few hours of my life have totally been weird to say the least, and now as I see Sadie’s colossal hand coming down on me, I realize just how totally f***** up this whole thing is. But this is my last chance to die in dignity. I saved this lady’s life at the cost of my own! It can’t get anymore heroic than….

Who the hell am I kidding?! I’m going to die! “AAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHH!” Hey, you would scream, too! Don’t judge me! But then her hand stopped, hovering above me like the sky. She slowly pulled it away and put it down on the floor far away from me (which was probably just a few inches away in real life, but it’s hard to tell the proportions of size at this height). I looked up to see her gargantuan eyes looking straight at me and a smile spread across her face.

“Thank goodness I found you!” she whispered. She leaned back on her knees and carefully placed her hand near me. I climbed onto Sadie’s fingernail and she gently lifted me up and dropped me in the palm of her other hand. It was like standing on an ocean of flesh. I could see every wrinkle, every crevice of her palm. Sadie slowly raised her hand up to her face and I sat there staring into her massive eyes. The warm breath of her nostrils ruffled my hair and I felt extremely puny when she opened her mouth to speak and revealed teeth bigger than I was.

“What are we going to do now?” she whispered.

“I need to find more women to talk to!” I yelled at the top of my lungs, but from the look on her face, I knew that Sadie couldn’t hear me. My voice was just too weak. Then her face lit up with what I hoped was an idea.

“I know something that will help you be heard,” she said. “Just hang on a moment.” Her fingers closed around me, encasing me in fleshy darkness. I could feel her begin to move, getting off the ground and walking to her destination. It wasn’t long before she came to a stop and opened up her fingers. In her other hand she was holding something…
11212111111222221112.title: I'm not dead!

choices: Use your free leg to kick yourself out of the Witch's grip
1121211111122222112.content:
No, you think, this is counter productive.

I've made it too far. Sure Sadie is in danger now, but a few quick compliments could shift the tide. You were 6 complements away from being normal-sized, you were near the home stretch.

You can't afford to go back now.
1121211111122222112.title: Decline the deal.

11212111111222221122.content:
"You're a clever one," you remark.

"What?" the Witch asks, giving you a look like a dog that had just heard a high-pitched noise.

"I mean, naturally, most men would go with the option that solves the most pressing problem at hand: Sadie returns to full-size and is immediately saved at the my expense. You'd essentially be punishing me for being 'The Knight In Shining Armor.' I'm no feminist, but that's a clever way to enforce your worldview."

Completely caught off-guard by your sudden awe, the Witch stares back at you. While her lips are pulled back in something resembling a smirk, but her massive eyebrows are scrunched up and her grayish-blue eyes give away her confusion. "Um, thanks...?" she replies. You feel something pulsate through your body, you know that you have to act quickly in order to take full advantage of the element of surprise.

"Yeah, I mean you must have taken some sort philosophy class in addition to that witchcraft thing, cause that's borderline genius. You're smarter than any girl I've ever met!" you reply, as the energy inside you causes your body to shake a little.

"Aw that's so- WAIT A MINUTE!" she shrieks.

Too late. You've now exploded from a 10 inch doll to a 2ft 5in dwarf from the 2 complements you were able to sneak in. Her hand can no longer support your sudden change in weight. She drops you and you fall...
11212111111222221122.title: You have a genius idea...

choices: You are shrunk back to 5 inches tall
112121111112222211221.content:
You hit the ground hard, but you force yourself to act quickly. Using all of your strength, you swing your legs and hit one of the legs on the Witch's stool. Miraculously, this is just enough to knock the stool over and send the Witch sprawling onto the floor. You get onto your feet and get int a fighting stance, although even at this size you're not she what sort of chance you stand in hand-to-hand combat. To your complete surprise, the Witch is already on her feet. As she advances on you, the annoyance is clear on her face; playtime is over.

"You're going to pay for that, you little shit!" she mutters.

"Damn, you rebound fast! How many fights have you been in before? I don't know too many girls who can-"

You're cut off as she kicks you, sending you flying across the store and slamming against a wall. By all means it should have shattered every bone in your body, but the impact wasn't exactly a trip to the spa either. Groaning loudly you pick yourself off the floor. The tiles appear somewhat smaller than they did before. You guessed that you were somewhere between 3'2 and 3'5, leaving you with 3 more complements to gain between 2'10 and 2'5 of height back. (Wait, so that means that every complement made you grow... let's see... divide by 2... carry the 1... no, but that's not consistent with that other time- you know what? Screw math. Back to fighting!)

"Thanks for not killing me sweetheart," you shout back,"were you holding back on that one out of the kindness of your heart or because you don't want to damage your play-thing? If it's the second one, I can appreciate a woman who sees the bigger picture."

"SHUT. THE. FUCK. UP!" The Witch yells, as you grow an additional couple of inches. The crazed look of anger in her eyes actually turned you on a bit.

What happen next? Not so much.

A large orange ball of pure energy materialized in her hand, the beginnings of a new spell. Your smile vanished, only to reappear on her face.

"You seem to have forgotten your place in all this, little man. Allow me to remind you," she said, as the orange ball of energy grew in her hands.
112121111112222211221.title: Sweep The Leg, Young Grasshopper

choices: She pushes you off and shrinks Sadie
1121211111122222112211.content: Just as it looks like the Witch is about to shoot her spell at you, Sadie comes flying out of nowhere and kicks her in the face. You have no idea how Sadie was able to get such air at 4 feet tall, but you don't waste time questioning it. The two are now engaged in a fight that would put a battle royal between Jackie Chan, Chuck Norris, and Bruce Lee to shame, and you could make the difference. In spite of all of Sadie's skills, the Witch is able to know her off her feet with one lean punch to the chest. The Witch picks her foot up to stomp on Sadie, when you leap at her with all your weight and tackle the Witch. After rolling around for a minute, you find yourself on top of her. You give a quick right, left, right, left combo to her face before the unexpected happens.
1121211111122222112211.title: Roundhouse!

choices: You shrink back to 5 inches tall
11212111111222221122112.content:
With a busted up lip and a look of pure diffidence, the Witch spits in your face with accuracy that would make a Llama blush. The spit lands right in your mouth, causing you to gag and fall backwards.

You taste blood in that spit, her blood.

Suddenly, you feel something rush through your body.
11212111111222221122112.title: Ewww

choices: You easily beat the Witch at her own game
112121111112222211221121.content:
You feel a sensation in your skin that you've never felt before. It's almost as if you're on fire, but the fire is cold.

You want to scream, but your whole body is numb. You start shaking violently. The Witch sees her opportunity, launching you through the store at about 100 mph. You speed backwards toward a wall and most likely your death. But right before you collide with the East side of the store, and your ultimate demise, you think a single thought:

No.

You did not think it out of fear or sadness, but out of shear stubbornness.

This is not how it ends.

Right before you hit the wall, everything stops.

You're no longer moving, in fact you're not even standing. You're about 2 feet off the ground, levitating by your own free will. You observe your new surrounds, raising and lowering yourself in the air. You're amazed by how natural it feels.

"I guess this just might turn out to be a fair fight," you yell across the store.

The Witch just laughs. "A fair fight? Not in your wildest dreams," she sneered, punctuating her point by launching a large beam of orange lightning at you. The room lit up with blinding white light, you can hear the windows shattering. Finally the light subsides and the Witch eagerly looks in your direction to see what remained of you .

To her shock you stood there, unfazed, holding the orb of orange lightning between your hands.

"I guess you're right, Witch," you reply, transferring the orb to one hand, "this won't be a fair fight..."

You focus on the orb for a minute and it turns blue. You crush the orb in your fist and you feel energy surge through your body. You are back to your original height of 6 feet tall.

"...this is going to be a certified ass-kicking."

You're levitating body goes horizontal and you fly full speed at the Witch, screaming a powerful battle cry.
112121111112222211221121.title: You're a Wizard, Harry (or whatever your name is)

1121211111122222112211211.content:
After roughly a 2 minute fight, the Witch is laying on the ground, battered and gasping for breath.

"H-h-how?" She choked out, "I-I've trained with these powers for years. You've only been using magic for the past 5 minutes!" Her speech seemed on the verge of tears "IT'S NOT POSSIBLE! HOW COULD IT BE POSSIBLE?"

"I don't know..." you say. Looking over, you see a 4 foot tall Sadie laying on the ground. You pick her up with your mind and levitate her toward you. You sit on the floor and lay her in your lap. She is unconscious, knocked out from when the Witch knocked her back earlier. She's covered in cuts, but you get a good look at her face for the first time. You push back her blond hair to see her soft, kind face, with a nose covered in freckles. Her forehead is bleeding and there's a cut on her chin, but you're somewhat encouraged by the feel of her softly breathing against your arm. Something about holding her tiny body in your arms feels right, but you know what you have to do.

"...maybe I'm just a fast learner," you continue, still looking down at Sadie, "maybe I inherited some of your knowledge from your blood. Hell, maybe I'm The One or The Avatar or something like that."

You look up at The Witch. "What matters is that I won..."

You lift your hand and The Witch levitates off the floor. Her hands and legs are spread apart.

"And to the victors go the spoils," you finish. A purple mist leaks from the Witches body. She groans in pain as all of it leaves her body and is absorbed into your hand. You drop the Witch to the floor in a heap and turn your attention to Sadie. With a yellow orb of lightning, you hover your hand over Sadie's body. Her wounds begin to vanish, and she begins to grow back to her original height. You stop at 5'2, guessing that was her original height.

"I have all your power and more," you say to the worn down former-Witch laying in front of you,"and now I'm going to use this power..."
1121211111122222112211211.title: You easily beat the Witch at her own game

11212111111222221122112111.content:
Upon the you saying the word "good," handcuffs materialized around the former-witch's hands. It seemed to be a redundant at though, as she wasn't going to have the energy to move anywhere for a few hours. About 15 minutes before the police arrived, Sadie woke up with a start. "WHO? WHAT? WHERE ARE WE?" she cried out as her upper body pops up off you. "Hey, it's okay," you reassure her, "We won."

"Really?" she asks.

"Yep."

"We're both back to normal size?"

"I think so. You were 5'2 before right?"

She giggles. "Nope. I was 4'11."

"Oh," you tease, "just give me a second here and I'll set you back to normal..."

"Nooooooo, pleeeaaasssee," she playfully whines, "I like being taller. Even if it's not that much taller."

"hahaha alright then," you reply.

"So," she asks after a minute of silence, "you can do the whole shrinking/growing thing now?"

"Yeah, I got all the witch's powers."

"How'd that happen?"

"She spit in my mouth."

"Emm.... kinky."

"hahaha it was nasty. But I guess some of her blood was in there, and I guess getting that into my system allowed me to use her magic. Beyond that, I have no clue how it happened. But I got 'em..."

"What are you staring at?"

"It just occurred to me that I never really noticed your eyes before, even when they were the size of my body. But now..."

"What?" Sadie said, studying you with those bright amber eyes that have you entranced.

"They're beautiful. Absolutely beautiful."

She turns away quickly, but you can tell she's blushing. "Thank you," she replies. After a minute or two of awkward silence she remarks, "This is so embarrassing."

"What?" you respond.

"You saved my life and I don't even know your name."

"Well, you saved my life 3 times."

"What? 3?"

"Yeah: you stood up for me when I was tiny, you took on that killer Barbie, and then you distracted the Witch when she was about to shrink me back again."

"Okay, fine. I admit it, I'm awesome. But seriously though, what's your name?"

"Mark. Mark Sanders."

"You kind of look like a Mark."

Sirens sounded nearby. "Well, you ready to explain all this crap to some skeptical police officers?" you ask Sadie. "Let's do it," she replies.

............................................................................ ................................................................................ ....

After hours of eyewitness interviews and cross referencing, the police seemed to get a story that they liked: a young woman (the Witch) held up a toy store with the threat of explosives, keeping two hostages who were somehow able to subdue the urban terrorist, and separate the bomb from her before it went off.

You both choose to remain anonymous in order to avoid the media. When things finally settle down, Sadie turns to you and asks: "What are you going to do now?"

"Well," you reply, "I probably should go fight some crime and see if there are any other witches out there...."
11212111111222221122112111.title: The hero we deserve...

112121111112222211221121112.content:
"...but that can wait till later."

"Really?" Sadie asked.

"Well... I was kind wanted to hang out with you right now."

"That sounds great! What do you want to do?"

"Well, I heard the view of the sunset from St. Helen's ridge is fantastic."

"There's no way we'd be able to drive up there fast enough. The roads will be blocked."

"Roads?" you reply with a smile, "My dear, where we're going..."

A Harry Potter style broomstick materializes in your hand.

"We won't need roads."

You mount your broom and indicate for Sadie to get on behind you.

"Oh right, I forgot," she says while chuckling, "you're OP now."

"You may want to hold on, I've never flown one of these before," you warn.

"Oh don't worry," she replies, "I'll be sure to puke on you."

With a smile on your face and a chorus of whoa's from both of you, you lift off the ground and head off toward St. Helen's.

It occurs to you here and now that this isn't just some chick: this is Sadie. She saved your life multiple times, she's kind hearted, she has a great sense of humor. And you find yourself wanting to know even more about her. You've had relationships go on for years that weren't as deep as the past few hours with Sadie.

So you literally fly off into the sunset with the girl of your dreams holding tightly on to you, competely open to what life has for you next.


The End
112121111112222211221121112.title: ...but not the one we need right now

You put a little charm on the word "revenge," giving her a burst of energy upon hearing her fate. You wanted her to feel the fear that you felt, instead of just waiting for the inevitable. The former-witch started to stand up, but she was starting to shrink before she could even get to her feet. By the time she started running away, she was a foot tall and a few seconds later she was 5 inches tall. You calmly levitate Sadie over to a chair and sit her down. Since you had put the fires from your battle out, the toy store would definitely be a safe place for her to stay until the paramedics showed up.

You have more pressing matters at hand.

The 5 inch tall former witch has only managed to make it about 7 feet from her original spot. You have no issue whatsoever walking over and scooping her up. As soon as your fingers wrapped around her tiny body, she let out a scream. Her voice, however, was proportionate to her body, so only you can hear it. She wriggles around in your fist even though you both know the struggle was in vein. She was yours now.

"Please don't do this," she says. "Oh don't worry," you say, running your finger up and down her leg, "I'm going to make sure you enjoy this more than I did."

You walk out of the toy store, with your prize in hand.
11212111111222221122112112.title: Old habits die hard...

112122.content:
...I can't talk to her! She's huge! Gigantic! She could squish me without ever realizing it!

I know I want to say something...but I just can't get any words out...Can't even bring myself to move...

And there she goes, standing back up to her full, incredible height, and all I can do is watch her hips as she walks away.

Before she gets far, she looks down at her shoes and bends over to tie her laces, giving me a nice view of her rather big butt. It is a little on the big side, but kind of mesmerizing.

Or maybe I'm just lamenting a lost opportunity. It's not too late, if I wanted to make a move and actually talk to her...Or I could just admire her from afar and focus on certain body parts, while my mouth remains forever paralyzed.

Though she is nice to admire from afar...But I also got the sense she'd be a nice person to meet.

What do I do?
112122.title: Intimidated

1121221.content:
Dammit. I have to try. I’m not staying this tiny forever.

If what the witch said is true, my voice hasn’t fully shrunk, but at this distance, I’d have to shout, which would alert the employee. Probably best to shock only one damsel at a time.

I’ve got seconds before she finishes tying her shoelace. She’s not too terribly far away, and I can hop a pretty good distance, like the insect I’ve become. I can grab onto her clothes and position myself to meet her. Sounds like a plan.

So here goes...A running start, and...

Hey, it’s like I’m flying! Wheeeee...!

Okay, so I can’t fly. I have no control. I’m on a collision course straight with the small of her back (small of her back...right...like anything’s small...)

But then she stands up and resumes walking away, as my flight path begins to drop off. I crash into her giant butt, and it bounces me off across the store.

Now I’m totally out of control. And I really don’t want to hit the ground from this hei--Oof!

I slam into something soft, so I grab it. It’s a gray surface. It’s clothing. I look up and figure out I’m again clinging to the employee’s pants. Granted, her breasts block my view of her face, but the color combination matches the outfit I saw earlier.

This all started because I wanted to get into a woman's pants. I suppose being on a woman's pants is some progress. I guess.

This angle really emphasizes how massive she is. She rises up and up and up...Whew. What’s it--Heh. That’s funny. I was just about to wonder what it’s like to be her size, but of course, I already know. Hard to believe, looking at her now...

Seems I’m a little above her knee. I’d probably survive the drop, given how slow I fall, but I’m not sure I want to bet my life on that theory.

I could climb up to her waist and hop off onto a shelf, or I could make things even simpler and just call up to her and ask for some assistance. I am a customer, after all, so she has to be nice to me. Although, does that rule apply to ant-sized men?
1121221.title: Go after her!

1122.content:
Wait. Something feels off...Something aside from my lack of height...

I turn around, and...

“AH!” I shout, as I find two enormous, feminine eyes lowered to my level, focused on me. And then I’m embarrassed, because a girl just saw and heard me shriek like a, well, girl...

“Easy there, little guy,” she whispers. “I’m not gonna hurt you...”

Weird to think how many of me can fit on the surface of just one of those pretty blue eyes...

This certainly is an odd way to meet someone, but whom am I meeting?
1122.title: Big eyes

11223.content:
She pulls her face back, and I get a better look at it. She looks to be at least a few years older than me, maybe pushing 30 or so. Her brown hair reaches down to her shoulders but no farther. It’s not long, but still unmistakably feminine. And the brown hair/blue eyes combo is certainly distinctive.

She’s pretty. Quite pretty.

She’s also incredibly confused. “So sorry if I startled you,” she whispers. “I just, you see, you’re, you know, tiny and all, and I...”

“I realize it’s unusual,” I tell her.

“Well, yeah, but the thing is, I didn’t think Dr. Cassidy had achieved actual human miniaturization yet. I knew she had a prototype ready for testing, but I thought she would’ve told me if she used it--”

“There’s a Dr. Cassidy who’s working on shrinking people?”

“She’s, yeah, and objects, too, but--You mean you never met her? You’re not like this because of--Oh, shoot.” She brings her hand to her mouth, though she’s too late to keep the cat in the bag. “No one’s supposed to know about that. I’m her assistant, and I’m supposed to keep it all a secret--”

She could stand to relax a little. After glancing around the store, we both see that there are only three other people present: the pretty clerk, and a parent and child, but they’re all on the far side of the store, talking to each other. So my new giant acquaintance feels comfortable continuing to talk to me.

“So if you’re not with Dr. Cassidy, how are you...?”

“A woman did this to me right outside here.” No need to give the full details. “She didn’t look like a doctor, though--far too young for that. Early 20s, 25 tops, maybe.”

“Dr. Cassidy’s in her mid-30s, so it wasn’t her. Did this other woman use a device of some sort?”

“Um...I didn’t see one.”

“And she just stranded you at this size?”

“Pretty much, yeah.”

“That’s horrible! I can’t imagine--I mean, you must feel so helpless--Not that you’re weak or anything--I mean, I’m sure you’re normally very independent and capable, but--”

“I understand. No offense taken. Everyone’s a giant to me, so I’m certainly not feeling my most macho.”

“Well, I’ll tell you what. I can take you to our lab, and we might be able to test the prototype on you and make you big again--Don’t worry--I can run some tests to make sure it’s safe. But we have to do it without Dr. Cassidy ever finding out. She will so fire my ass if she catches me playing with her machine. And if we tell her about you, she’ll want to study you like some lab animal, and that wouldn’t be right. That would be so horrible and degrading.”

As she babbles, I’m struck by just how adorable this giant woman is. I can see every flaw on her face magnified a thousandfold, but she is still absolutely precious and kind.

And with that, I sprout up...a little, anyway. I grow to--I don’t know--maybe half an inch tall or so. But much larger than that puny ant size.

“Oh my God!” my new friend says. “Is it wearing off?”

“Uh, I don’t know. I don’t really know what to expect.” True enough, I suppose.

“Well, do you want me to take you to the lab, just in case?”
11223.title: A new friend

choices: Hide and let Kaitlin figure something out.
112231.content:
If there’s a way to grow me back without having to humiliate myself in front of nine more women...Sounds great to me.

“Yeah. I’m in,” I say. “Let’s do it.”

“Okay, great,” she says. As she reaches her enormous fingers toward me, I can’t help but flinch. Never been snatched by a giant before. She notices, and stops. “Are you okay?”

“Yeah, yeah, of course,” I say, as masculine as possible.

“I’m just going to pick you up and put you in my purse. If that’s okay with you. I promise I’ll be super-gentle. I won’t crush you or anything. Wouldn’t even cross my mind. Or I guess it just did, but only because you got scared there. I mean, I’m sure you’re not scared, just startled, and there’s nothing wrong with being scared--I mean startled...I mean...I’m just going to pick you up now, okay?”

“Please do.”

I brace myself as those mighty fingers return and latch onto my shirt. She lifts me into the air, as she remembers, “Oh, my name’s Kaitlin.”

“I’m Billy,” I say, dangling between her fingers, not wanting to look down.

“Pleasure to meet you.”

“You, too.”

She smiles at me. I continue to hang, reeeaaalllyy high up.

“I’m ready for that purse now,” I tell her.

“Oh, right! In you go!” she says, depositing me into something pink. “Sorry about the clutter! I wasn’t expecting company.”

It’s indeed cluttered, and it smells very...feminine. It’s too dark to see much. I notice her keys and wallet, but who knows what any of the other junk is?

I’m in a damn purse. Fully inside it. And yet it’s not the weirdest part of my day. Being shrunk easily takes the crown there.

I hear another young woman’s voice from the outside world. “Ma’am, what did you just put into your purse?” I think it’s the pretty store worker. And she clearly thinks I’m a toy--a stolen toy.

The purse isn’t fully zipped, so I gaze up through the gap and see enough of Kaitlin’s face to recognize the deer-in-headlights look. How good of a liar is she? Or should I risk revealing myself?
112231.title: Offer accepted

1122311.content:
Maybe I just feel inspired by Kaitlin’s genuinely good nature, but I find myself doing something bold.

“Kaitlin, your hand, please,” I say.

She lowers her flat hand just outside the purse, and I hop onto it. And yes, it’s the pretty store worker bothering us, but I’ve got her attention now all right. I’ve never seen such huge eyes, proportionally speaking. It's gonna take her a moment to process this.

“Hi there,” I say to the over-sized beauty. “While I can appreciate that you clearly have a solid work ethic, as you can see, I’m actually a wee little man, not a stolen toy. And this lady here has offered to help me become a whole lot less wee. So if you’ll excuse us...” I glance up at Kaitlin, who’s smiling down on me. “Let’s go, Kaitlin.”

As I finish talking, my size increase some more. I’m guessing I’m something like two inches tall now, give or take a little. I'll take it.

I hop back into the purse, and Kaitlin starts walking us away. She asks, “Did you just grow again? If you keep this up, you won’t need Dr. Cassidy’s research.”

“Best not to take any chances,” I say. I’m two down, yeah, but the eight-to-go still seems like a lot.
1122311.title: Hi there!

choices: The Lab - Kaitlin's going to find Dr Cassidy...
Kaitlin's House - She needs a quick rest stop...
1122312.content:
Poor Kaitlin - she seems to have a mixture of fear over being accused of stealing and worry at your exposure to the world, particularly when you're so close to the chance of returning to your full size, and this concern at your wellbeing really moves you in that one single look. For your first woman, Katlin is really setting the bar... but now there's the chacne you migh be parting company unless she can think on her feet quickly...

Fortunately she seems to do it as a warm, slightly embarassed smile appears on her face. "I'm sorry to worry you... it's just that I dropped my..." At this she seems from your vantage point to adopt a even more uncomfortable look as she leans towards the shore worker, clearly not wanting anyone else (not that anyone else appears to be looking) hear what she whispers. "Erm, my tampoon. I was a little clumsy and I didn't want to draw attention so... if you want to check..."

"Oh... sure, that's ok, my mistake madam." The pretty worker appears to have fallen for Kaitlin's lie perfectly, and you can see the akward look on her own face. A pity really, she's only doing her job. But the fact remains that you have the chance to get back to normal and you intend to take it.

Not wanting to go out of character for the sake of the shop worker, Kaitlin heads over to the woman's bathroom at the back of the shop for a few minutes and enters a cubicle. The slight perv in you is more than keen to examine the circumstances behind the running water you hear from outside, but the witch wanted you to become a gentleman and frankly you're keen to prove her right, not to mention asking Katlin out once you're back to normal. Because what she's doing for you proves she's the kind of person you'd like to know better.

...

Darn it, you didn't return to full size. But still, you progress in personality. But if you can't cheat the system and grow a little, so much the better. After her loo stop Kaitlin heads outside and you feel your world swaying. Whilst you're on the way you try and use your environment to figure out a little better about your possible future love interest, just seeing lipstick, a perfume bottle and indeed a tampoon. Looks like Kaitlin was able to back up her story with the store worker if she was pressed.

After a few minutes you feel the purse placed down, very gently. Looks like Kaitlin really wants to keep you safe - you admire her for that. As the zip opens up you see where you are...
1122312.title: Clever Girl!

113.content:
Of course, there aren't too many toys that a man of my considerable inconsiderableness could interact with without risking death. Action figures? Colossal statues. Sports equipment? I couldn't lift so much as a shuttlecock. I behold the aisle after aisle of gigantic icons, Toy Story flashbacks having me half-imagine that they'll come to life any second.

They don't, of course, but still I have to keep clear as even bigger children run down the aisles without warning, their scattered footsteps only eclipsed by the crushing impacts of the inevitable parents following in their wakes. Browsing like this isn't too healthy for me!

So I keep my ambitions modest, in keeping with my stature. There are very few of these toys that I can play with, but this new size does give me a chance to inspect them more closely than ever.

So, which toy do I want to inspect? There is a small-ish (to a regular person!) piano here, and I've always wanted to know what the insides of one of those looks like - now's my chance!

Alternatively, there's a massive talking doll - I could venture inside to see all the moving parts.

Or finally, a set of construction blocks have been set up in a display of a tiny town - I could explore the streets of slightly smaller giants, and observe the intricasies of construction put into that artwork.
113.title: Outsize

choices: A woman picks up the doll
A child knocks the doll of the shelf
You hear a familiar voice from outside
1132.content:
About 20 feet off the ground on one of the shelves, you saw a lineup of baby shaped dolls. You heard of these things. They were of the freaky talking variety. Never having been exactly comfortable around these things at normal sized... seeing them seated up above you, like overlords with plastic skin and dead, glassy eyes... well, the feeling of slight fear was present.

However, at the end of the day they are dolls, and you were curious to get a close up look of what made up the insides of one of those plastic behemoths.

With a few great leaps from shelf to shelf, you landed on the smooth bald head of one of the dolls, and slipped into the panel on its back, now finding yourself within the doll.
1132.title: Inner Machinations

choices: She places the doll back on the shelf
11321.content:
You dont notice the approaching voices of a pair of customers as you tinkered around with the dolls voicebox. Eventually, though they were slightly obscured by the confines of the dolls plastic skin, the voices were to close to be ignored as you could now hear them as if they were right infront of the doll.

"Oh crap. They're right in front of the doll.", you said to yourself. "Please dont pick mine up."

From outside you heard one of them (who sounded like a young woman) inquire to her shopping partner about the lineup of dolls before her.

"What about one of these?", the mystery woman asked.

Suddenly, your balance became compromised as the doll was lifted off the shelf and now hovering in this womans hands, causing you to slip down the inner shell of the doll to its "taint". In response to the womans question, another voice chimes in.

"Another doll? Don't you think she has enough of them Maggie.", her feminine soft southern accent was much like this "Maggies", just younger.

Meanwhile, you were compiling your thoughts on the nature of these two mystery females. From what little you knew of them, they seemed nice enough. Their gentle, sexy voices just gave off a good vibe. Now you just had to put faces to these voices. So you stepped along the inner "taint" of the doll towards the front and peaked out from a small seperated seam in the plastic.

You couldnt see alot of Maggie, but you were able to see she was wearing some kind of maroon shirt and had short dark brown hair. You couldnt make out anything else really. And as for the other girl, no luck at all.

Of course you were now interested in meeting these people, but how should you break the ice?
11321.title: Well aint you a doll

113212.content:
The goal is to meet women I find attractive other than their looks, which means voices were fair game! And that voice certainly did the trick. Now all that was left was to actually meet this "Maggie".

You make your way back up to the exit panel of the doll, pop it open enough for you to slip out, then clamber back up to the top of the dolls head. Finally, you could put a gorgeous face to a gorgeous voice. Maggie had to be in her mid twenties, as she only looked slightly older than you. But she was an beautiful looking woman nonetheless! Her face looking down at the doll and you in her hands, but only truly seeing the former.

You also spot the girl she had been speaking too. A blonde haired teenager to her left, still talking to Maggie about the subject of too many dolls for one person, also a great beauty.

Now was the time to get started on introductions, so with a great leap, you cross the distance between the doll and the face and land with on your belly on the bridge of Maggies nose, scrambling to find purchase as you began to slide down the slant before finally managing to keep your grip on the softer portion of the nose, the tip.

"Aw dammit. Why cant you think ahead for once?", you say to yourself. You felt like a fool being in the spread eagle position you were in right now.

Thankfully though, it didnt take long for Maggie to quit looking down at the doll and level her head again as she placed it back on the shelf, allowing you to be able to stand up. Her green eyes lorded above up ahead like distant moons, you had your doubts those massive orbs would even be able to register your puny existence, but your here now, so its worth a shot at least.

"Ahem... um... Hey there Maggie." You start, taken by surprise by her heads sudden sweeping movements as she tries to find the source of the noise. "Whoa! Um...ahaha... if your looking for a good gift might i suggest yours trulyeeeeEEEE!"

Your left foot slips due to the simple movements of Maggies head and you once again find yourself clinging on your belly to the flesh of the nose!

"Uhm... sorry, who said that?", Maggie asked. "Do you know where that came from Emily?"

The blonde girl (Emily), also visibly confused, said "It sounded like it came from right here."

"Well actaully it did. Maggie, would be so kind as to look on your nose please?"

You crane your head up and watch as Maggies eyes, still furrowed with confusion, focus in on the tiny speck on her face. And though you didnt realize it, you were surrounded by giant eyes, as Emily had stepped in front of Maggie to get a good look aswell.

"Oh my god! Maggie thats... thats a tiny guy!", Emily said ecstatically.

Before you knew it, two powerful fingers had plucked you up between them by the collar of your shirt and raised you up to eye level.

"You... you really are tiny. How did this happen? And what were doing on my nose?", Maggie asked.

"Yeah and whats with that garbage pickup attempt?", Emily chimed in.

"Oh uhhh... well you see..."
113212.title: The Bridge to Recognition

1132121.content:
"Well, I was hiding inside this doll, and when the pair of you came along I thought to myself: I need to get to know these women, see if there's anything atttactive about them beyond their voices and -"

Oh dear, I'm babbling. Clenched as I am between the gigantic, painful fingers I just blurt everything out, and probably not in the best way. I should have taken more time to compose my story, perhaps even sugar-coated it with a little white lie, as Maggie's judemental face above doesn't seem too impressed.

Her grip (or is it Emily that holds me? To be honest, I'm not sure) releases, and for a moment I fall. That fraction of a second is all it takes for the fingers to press tighter, squishing me between them as they rub back and forth, obliterating me effortlessly.

Turns out, sometimes honesty is not the best policy.
1132121.title: Truth Hurts

choices: Speak up, get the first of ten down!
Climb for a safe vantage point
The choice is taken away by her own actions..!
114.content:
Each of her steps covers an incredible distance. I have to run to keep up with her slow pace, and when she stops I am overjoyed. Following in her wake, observing the tremendous impacts of her shoes against the ground, hurling up hitherto invisible scads of dust, I avoid being stepped on by anyone else. Still, it's nice to take a breather.

As I gasp, I glance upwards. She has moved behind an obelisk that, while shorter than her, is still hundreds of storeys to ant-like me. Ah! She's behind the counter! The distinct sound of a barcode scanning so far above finally slots the piece into place.

Well, I have a human-loud voice, a knee-high jumping capability and a stationary (hardly captive, given the size disparity!) audience. Should I speak to her, I wonder? Or merely jump up her trousers to try and reach higher ground? I don't want to have to run anywhere ever again...
114.title: A Bit of Exercise

choices: Keep trying to talk to her.
1141.content:
I follow her behind the counter. It’s nice there. She’s stationary, and no other giants are stomping around.

It’s so weird thinking of normal people as giants, but the sooner I start talking to these girls, the quicker they’ll stop being giants.

I stand beside her business-casual footwear and gaze up the side of her pant leg -- and I keep gazing up, up, and up some more, and her body just keeps going on almost forever. This is my first chance to really slow down and get a feel for the scope of my situation. I’m not just tiny. I’m damn tiny.

Her voice booms overhead as she chats with the middle-aged couple making a purchase. She laughs at their corny jokes. Despite her...augmentation...she sounds so pleasant and delightful.

The transaction is complete, and I figure I have a moment before she moves on to another chore. It’s intimidating, talking to someone of her stature, but I remind myself I don’t want to be damn tiny forever.

“You’re a giant of customer service,” I tell her.

Her head swings to both sides. My body swells as she seems to shrink.

“Did someone say something?” she asks, as she takes a step in my direction.

I’m still readjusting to my new scale. Don’t know how much I grew, but her shoe is still much, much bigger than me -- and it’s heading right for me.

I throw myself back. Dummy that I am -- or just disoriented by the size shift -- I throw myself right into the path of her other foot. Seems giants have two feet, too. I barely manage to roll aside as the shoe crashes down, sending tremors through the floor. The sudden thud is probably going to leave me with tinnitus or something.

I gaze up at her again. She’s smaller, yeah, but still more massive than a person has a right to be -- still dangerous, I realize.

But she does seem nice.
1141.title: A giant of customer service

11412.content:
Maybe my sense shrank with my size, but I feel compelled to keep talking to this girl. She just seems so nice. Who knows? She might even help me meet some other girls and speed through this little quest of mine.

“I’m down here!” I call up. “At your feet.”

She looks down and sees me, and with a speed that belies her massive form, she drops to her knees and lowers her head right in front of me. The floor trembles beneath her, but I manage to stay standing.

Her gorgeous face fills my view. Yet I find myself thinking that if I were on the other side of her, I’d have a great view of her ass. Maybe I deserved to get shrunk. No, I deserved a slap on the face at the most. No one deserves this.

Umm...This girl’s staring at me and not saying anything. I suppose this is a new situation for her. New for me, too. Never tried to converse with a giant woman before. Maybe I should start...?
11412.title: A closer look

114122.content:
“How did you get down there?” she asks, not expecting a response, as she seems to think I’m a toy. “Back to the shelf with you.”

The toy store clerk clamps her fingers around me and lifts me to amazing heights, though I doubt she thinks of her own waist-level as an amazing height. I’m treated to a view of her long, long legs walking back and forth as she takes me across the store. I lament that she’s wearing long pants, and I remind myself not to be so shallow.

She sets me down on a waist-high shelf with numerous figurines, each about three or four times my size, but it probably makes more sense to think I’m one of them rather than a guy shrunken to half an inch tall. Her mind is playing tricks on her to preserve her sanity. Can’t fault her.

I suppose I should be flattered she classified me with the Disney characters. I find myself standing next to a really tall Belle and the Beast, and there‘s Mickey and the gang right there. I feel like a kid in Disney World.

Of course, I’m not going to hang out here. Time’s a-wasting. I’ve got nine more women to meet.

And here comes one now, walking down this aisle all by herself, and she’s...eh. The age looks about right, twenty-something, and her face is quite attractive. A redhead’s always a plus. But she looks slightly too heavy. She’s not nearly obese. Well, she’s quite large to me, obviously, but she’s much larger than the employee. A few too many pounds to be my physical type.

I do need to stop being so shallow, though. She might be a decent person.
114122.title: Toy story

choices: Play along and pretend to be a talking toy
With her full attention, tell her the truth
1141221.content:
One woman down, I should get cracking on number two as soon as possible! I'm not going to get a better chance than now, with a perfect target strolling casually before me!

Of course, I have nothing to judge her personality by, until she stops and crouches, her vast face dominating my view. For a moment, I think she has spotted me, but no, her great green eyes are focussed beyond me, on one of the Disney characters.

With the unearthly speed the attendant had used when picking me up, her hand is up and forward before I can breathe. The gigantic appendage effortlessly lifts Mickey Mouse from his spot, the towering statue nothing more than a toy in her grip (surprising, that!). She turns it this way and that, her fingers deftly maneuvering the item for a view of it from all angles. Just as quickly, the massive mouse is placed back beside me, impact shaking the shelf beneath me with a booming sound.

"Piece of corporate crap," she mutters as she rises to her full height again. Another person may not have caught the comment, but to me it's like it's being announced throughout a stadium speaker system. With this opening, I use my own booming voice (I don't stop to wonder how I don't deafen myself; let's just chalk that up to magic, shall we?) to say something:

"Good on you for not buying that cheap plastic rubbish."

This time, she is looking directly at me. Her cavernous mouth is gaping slightly as she sees me, yet it's not as bad as it was before thanks to my doubling in height again. One inch tall, I stand before her as warm, dmap breath mists over me: "What, should I buy you instead, then?"
1141221.title: Hey, Good Looking

choices: Look for a jumping off point.
Stick around and see where she's going.
11412211.content:
I've already gotten what I need from her, so I might as well have fun.

"Buy me! Buy me!" I say as if I were animatronic.

She bends down, and her eyes zoom in for a close inspection. "Wow. That's so lifelike, especially for being so small."

She pokes my stomach with her substantial finger, so I continue playing along.

"I am the greatest toy ever!"

Her eyes maneuver a little lower in search of a price sign. Seeing none, she picks me up and looks beneath my feet, but no sticker's there either. But I guess I've still got her curiosity, so she carries me toward the cashier. Her grip could be a little looser.

Didn't really think this through, did I?

The giant redhead sets me on the counter and asks the pretty cashier how much I cost. The cashier provides my next inspection. She zaps me with the scanner, and the red light is nearly blinding at this scale -- had I looked directly into it, it might actually have blinded me.

"This is so weird," the cashier says. I stay stiff as I can as she holds me up to her gorgeous face. "I never saw anything like this before today, and there's no barcode of any kind. And it looks so real, doesn't it? I would almost think this is actually a tiny person."

"I know! Right?"

"You know what? If you want it, just take it."

"Awesome. Thanks."

The redhead shoves me into her jeans' back pocket. As she walks off, I feel the denim tightening against me and relaxing with every step. I'd rather have been this close to the cashier rather than up against the redhead's slightly too large ass, but hey, it's surprisingly pleasant. I do need to be careful when she sits down, though.
11412211.title: Boy toy

choices: Hop off and watch the couple argue.
114122112.content:
It's surprisingly comfortable in this woman's back pocket -- soft, warm, and snug -- and I think I need a moment to rest up before finding my next eight women to talk to. I've made pretty decent progress so far, haven't I? So, break time.

I poke my eyes out just above the lip of the pocket and watch the giant world pass behind the woman as she strolls down the sidewalk. Lots of attractive women out and about, so I decide to hang out in the pocket a little longer and admire the view whenever my ride stops for traffic at an intersection.

But soon I start to notice something. Guys keep staring at this woman's ass. Some just glance quickly, then move on. Others linger a little too long. A few look really creepy about it, like they're salivating over a delicious meal or something. I would not want to be alone in any dark alleys with some of these fellows. Oh, God, I hope I never look that creepy.

No one notices me. To the horny gaze, I'm practically invisible against a large butt, but the attention is making me a tad uncomfortable nevertheless.

And what's up with that dude? He's walking alongside this total knockout, a stunningly gorgeous woman, got his arm around her, and he keeps checking out this woman's fat ass? His girlfriend's really skinny, but what, is she too skinny for his tastes? Hey, man, learn to be satisfied. Take your victory and appreciate the lady who clearly wants to spend time with you.

Ohh! She just caught him staring and is giving him the evil eye.

I'm curious to see how this plays out, but my ride is starting to outpace the couple.
114122112.title: Dat ass, tho

choices: Shout out to the mother now, and risk the daughter noticing
Attempt to climb higher up the woman, to communicate more secretly
Avoid the pair and look for less dangerous women
115.content:
While I'm pondering these many fun options, I may be neglecting to observe my surroundings. When I finally notice the shadow growing over me, I only just manage to avoid being crushed utterly beneath the descending foot. I'm up in moments, craning my neck back to see which particular brand of gargantuan nearly ended me there.

My jaw drops as I realise that I was almost ended by an eight-year-old girl. That's how low I've sunk.

To add insult to, well, insult, she's bellowing things out up above me, demanding various toys and bounding from side to side with anticipation. I find myself flinching, and instinctively hopping back and forth just to avoid another haphazardly-placed foot.

I pity the poor parent that has to deal with such a brat, and no sooner have I formed such an opinion than in she wanders, a mountain of calm in the midst of her daughter's greedy ramblings. Of course, I don't get much of a view beyond her knees, but her slow motions - making predicting which areas will be ground zero of her footfalls easy, something I'm grateful for - combined with the quiet yet forceful hushing noises she uses to rein in her daughter have me in awe.

Awed enough to approach her, though? I mean, there is that whole eight-year-old daughter thing to deal with. As much as complimenting women on their character appeals to me, being squished by a little girl is pretty far from my priorities right now. Hmm, maybe I could use my leaping skills to get a bit higher, out of reach of that monster?
115.title: Inaction
